Nabii Yunus koi tolunondom tolungilio na lalomna kompongna susum balaki'. Koiya'a uga' a Anak Manusia bo dumodongo na lalomna tano' koi tolunondom tolungilio.
Na tempo pungukumian ni'imarian, mianna kota Niniwe bo potuo'ion singka-singkat tia mian men tumuo' na tempo koini'i. Mianna Niniwe iya'a bo mansasala' i kuu, gause mianna Niniwe iya'a nonsosolimo ka' nangkadarai gau'na i raaya'a men ba'idek na tempo i raaya'a nomorongor pisiso' ni Yunus. Poali na ko'omuu koini'i isian men labi i Nabii Yunus a kobalaki'na!
Na tempo pungukumian ni'imarian, tomundo' wiwine na tano' paraas Selatan bo potuo'ion singka-singkat tia mian men tumuo' na tempo koini'i. Ka' i ia bo mansasala' i kuu. Tomundo' wiwine iya'a ringkat na ko'oloaan tuu', na puusna tano' balaki', ka' taka nomorongor pisiso' ni tomundo' Salomo men pinginti'ianan. Poali na ko'omuu koini'i isian men labi i Salomo a kobalaki'na!”
“Kalu se' meena mamarerei sa'angu' mian, meena iya'a mae'mo tumikum na tampat men makangkung mansarak pintimalean, kasee sian nantausi.
Kasi i ia morobu taena, ‘Yaku' bo mule'kon na laigan men yaku' parereimo.’ Ia nomae'mo see nantakai laigan iya'a liing, moloe' nikarei, ka' nitotobo' pore-pore.
Kasi i ia umuar ka' nangange pitu' meena sambana men ba'idekna tii ia. Kasi i raaya'a ninsoop na mian iya'a, ka' nodumodongo indo'o. Komburi'na mian iya'a na'idekmo tuu' pookokoikonon tia men tumbena. Koiya'a uga' a men bo sida na mian men ba'idek na tempo koini'i.”
Pintanga' i Yesus morobu tia mian biai' iya'a, notakamo a sina-Na ka' utus-Na. Raaya'a potokerer na liwa mansarak pootuung tii Yesus.
Sa'angu' mian na mian biai' iya'a nambantilkonmo ni Yesus taena, “Piile'! Sina-Muu tia utus-Muu mokaraale'e na liwa, mampari-pari momootuungi i Kuu.”
Kasee ia simbati i Yesus a mian men nambantilkon iya'a tae-Na, “Ime mbali' a sinang-Ku? Ime mbali' a utus-Ku?”
Kasi i Ia ninsiso' murit-Na ka' norobu tae-Na, “Iraani'i a sinang-Ku tia utus-Ku!
Gause i ime a men mangawawau koi pingkira'na Tamang-Ku men na surugaa, iamo a utus-Ku moro'one, utus-Ku wiwine, ka' iamo a sinang-Ku.”
Na iliopo iya'a uga' i Yesus namarereimo laigan iya'a, kasi nomae' na soripi'na danau ka' no'umoruang indo'o.
Biai' a mian men notaka nunguruuti i Yesus, pataka i Ia somo nolumakit na duangan ka' no'umoruang. Kasee mian biai' iya'a giigii' potokerer na poso'oleon.
Kasi i Yesus nintimbaani'kon biai' kaliangan pisiso' na ko'ona i raaya'a. Tae-Na, “Imamat ini'imari! Isian po'ale' sa'angu' mae' mangkambur wine' na ale'na.
Banta-bantang i ia mangkambur, isian wine' men nandawo' na soripi'na salan. Kasi notaka a sapu' ka' nangkaan wine' iya'a pataka nokabus.
Isian uga' men nandawo' na karabatu, men sian laan tano'na. Wine' iya'a liuliu notumuo' gause tano'na monipis.
Kasee sarataa no'alayo'mo a ilio, wine' men notuo'mo iya'a nalaumo, kasi nakangkung ka' nopate, gause wakatna sian alalom.
Isian uga' wine' men nandawo' na rakut masolot ka' ruri'on. Kasi rakut masolot ka' ruri'on iya'a no'uminsur ka' ningipit wine' men notuo'mo iya'a pataka nopate.
Kasee isian uga' wine' men nandawo' na tano' men molumba', kasi niwoo'. Woo'na isian men para sa'atu paku', isian men poro nomompulo' paku', ka' isian uga' men poro tolumpulo' paku'.”
Noko daa nuntundunkon timbaani' iya'a, Yesus norobumo tae-Na, “Daa tilingaan, imamat pore-pore!”
Kasi murit ni Yesus notaka na Ko'ona nobapikirawar taena, “Nongko'upa i Kuu se' batimbaani' kalu batundun na mian biai'?”
Ia simbati i Yesus tae-Na, “Kuu nitaraimo pinginti'ian kada' minginti'i upa men mawuni na Batomundo'anna Surugaa, kasee i raaya'a sian.
Gause mian men isianmo upa ia tombonoi bo taraion soosoodo, ka' i ia bo kalabian. Kasee mian men sianta upa tombonoionna, toro tiu'po men dauga' isian na ko'ona bo alaon.
Mbali' iya'a, Yaku' batimbaani' kalu batundun na mian biai', gause mau i raaya'a poopiile', kasee koi mian men mampisok. Ka' mau i raaya'a poorongor, kasee koi mian men mabongol ka' sian minginti'i.
Tempo i raaya'a nangawawau men koiya'a, mbaka' nosidamo a wurungna Tumpu men ia tundun i Nabii Yesaya taena, ‘Raaya'a bookoi nomorongor kasee sian ninginti'i; raaya'a bookoi nimiile' kasee sian ninginti'i upa men nosida.
Gause pinginti'ina mian karaani'i noko'ompodianmo, tilingana i raaya'a nopabongolmo ka' matana i raaya'a nirampitkonmo. Nosida koiya'a kada' matana i raaya'a alia mimiile', tilingana i raaya'a alia momorongor, pikiranna i raaya'a alia minginti'i ka' alia mule'kon na Ingku', pataka i Yaku' mengelesi'i i raaya'a.’ ”
“Kasee barakaation i kuu gause matamuu daa poopiile' ka' tilingamuu daa poorongor.
Imamat a men taeng-Ku', ka' uga' bantilkonon-Ku na ko'omuu se' biai'mo a nabii mbaripian tia mian men malolo' na Alaata'ala mingkira' mimiile' men koi kuu piile'mo koini'i, kasee i raaya'a sian nimiile'. Raaya'a mingkira' mongorongor men koi kuu rongormo koini'i, kasee i raaya'a sian nongorongor.”
“Mbali' iya'a, porongori pore-pore a aratina timbaani'na po'ale iya'a.
Wine' men nandawo' na salan, ya'amo mian men nongorongor lelena Batomundo'anna Surugaa, kasee sian minginti'i. Mian iya'a ia rae'i i ia men gau'na ba'idek ka' nirampasi a upa men nipoko kamburmo na noana.
Wine' men nikambur na karabatu mase mian men nongorongor wurung iya'a, ka' lako-lako nangalabot tia noa beles.
Kasee wurung iya'a sian niwakat na noana i raaya'a. Mbali' iya'a, sian paraa notontaan nanau' a notuo'anna. Tempo i raaya'a takaionna repaan kabai se' talalaison gause lele iya'a, raaya'a liuliu minsasapu kaparasaya'anna.
Wine' men nikambur na rakut masolot ka' ruri'on mase mian men nongorongor wurung iya'a, kasee dauga' babatakon tutuo'na i raaya'a ka' uga' mingkira' tumuo' labian na tano' balaki' kani'i. Mbali' iya'a, wurungna Alaata'ala noko'ipit na noana i raaya'a, mbaka' sian niwoo'.
Ka' wine' men nikambur na tano' men molumba' mase mian men nongorongor lele iya'a kasi ninginti'i ka' miwoo'. Ule'na isian men para sa'atu paku', poro nomompulo' paku', ka' isian men poro tolumpulo' paku'.”
Yesus nuntundunkonmo soosoodo sa'angu' timbaani' tae-Na, “Batomundo'anna Surugaa iya'a koi sa'angu' po'ale' men nangkambur wine'na gandum na ale'na.
Na sa'angu' malom, tempona koroyotanna mian, notakamo a mian men maso'kon i ia ka' nangkambur woo'na padang na tanga'na gandum, kasi nomae'.
Takamo tempo kotuo'anna woo'na padang iya'a ka' muntumbeimo mimburak, mbaka' nokampiile'anmo uga' a padang biai' na ale' iya'a.
Kasi notaka a mian men ia tamboi po'ale' iya'a, ka' norobu taena, ‘Tuan, taasi' mbali' wine' pore a men kuu kambur na ale'muu? Koi upa mune' se' isian padang na ale' iya'a?’
Ia simbati po'ale' iya'a taena, ‘Isian sa'angu' mian men maso'kon i yaku' a men nangawawau koiya'a!’ Kasi mian men nitamboi iya'a nimikirawar soosoodo taena, ‘Tuan, kuu mingkira' kalu i kai mae' mangarawuti padang iya'a?’
Ia simbati po'ale' iya'a taena, ‘Alia. Kalu rawutionmuu a padangna iya'a, too mba'a bo ko'anuian tia gandum.
Sobii rua-rua'na bi tuo' pataka tempona pamadakan. Bantilkononkusi na mian men mamadak se' tambun kutung a padangna, koot, kasi tunu. Moko daa iya'a, kasi posuu'onku mantambun gandumna ka' manganaa' na alangku.’ ”
Yesus nuntundunkonmo soosoodo timbaani' sambana na mian biai' tae-Na, “Batomundo'anna Surugaa iya'a koi watuna sasawi ia ala mian kasi nikambur na ale'na.
Watuna sasawi iya'a sa'angu' wine' men itiu'na na giigii' wine' sambana. Kasee kalu tumuo' ka' uminsur, kobalaki'na mangalalabii aso-asok sambana. Ia mingkaumo pataka sapu' na lealaa taka mimpeeta na panga'na.”
Yesus nuntundunkonmo sa'angu' timbaani' soosoodo na mian biai' tae-Na, “Batomundo'anna Surugaa iya'a koi ragi men ia ala sa'angu' wiwine, kasi ia lauk na patompulo' liter tarigu ka' nikior pataka no'uminsur giigii'.”
Giigii' pisiso' ni Yesus na mian biai' Ia bantilkon tia timbaani'. Pisiso'-Na iya'a sianta sa'angu'po a men sianta nitimbaani'kon.
Tempo i Yesus batimbaani', mbaka' nosidamo a wurungna Tumpu koi men ia tadulkon nabii, men koi kani'imari: “Yaku' batimbaani' kalu morobu tii raaya'a; Yaku' bo mambantilkon upa-upa men niwunikon muntumbeipo ninsidakonan dunia kani'i.”
Noko daa iya'a ai Yesus namarereimo mian biai' iya'a ka' ninsoop na laigan. Kasi murit-Na notaka ka' norobu taena, “Kai mikisiso'kon aratina timbaani' padang na tanga'na gandum iya'a.”
Ia simbati i Yesus tae-Na, “Mian men nangkambur wine' pore iya'a, ya'amo Anak Manusia.
Ale' iya'a, mase tano' balaki' kani'i. Wine' men pore iya'a mase mianna Batomundo'anna Surugaa. Padang iya'a mase mian men malolo' na ko'ona men gau'na ba'idek.
Mian men maso'kon po'ale' iya'a ka' nangkamburkon padang iya'a mase Ibiliis. Tempona pamadakan, mase kakabusanna tempo, ka' mian men mamadak mase malaa'ikat.
Koi padang men tambunon ka' tunuon na apu, koiya'a uga' na kakabusanna tempo.
Anak Manusia bo momosuu' malaa'ikat-Na mingirimpung giigii' mian na batomundo'an-Na men nanggau'kon mian nangawawau dosa tia giigii' mian sambana men nangawawau ba'idek.
Raaya'a giigii' bo tibarkonon na apu men leaambangan. Indo'o i raaya'a bo tumando' ka' marepa tuu'.
Ka' giigii' mian men malolo' na Alaata'ala bo kampiile'an a ruarna koi matana ilio na Batomundo'anna Tamana i raaya'a. Daa tilingaan, imamat pore-pore!”
“Batomundo'anna Surugaa iya'a koi kupang men ninaa' na lalomna tano' men ia tausi sa'angu' mian, kasi ia kekekon soosoodo. Gause nobeles tuu', mian iya'a nomae'mo nambalukkon giigii' upana, kasi nomule'kon ka' ningili tano' iya'a.”
“Batomundo'anna Surugaa iya'a uga' koi sa'angu' pobaluk mansarak mutiara men pore.
Sarataa i ia nimiile' sa'angu' mutiara men umangga' tuu', lako-lako i ia nomae' ka' nambalukkon giigii' upana, kasi ningili mutiara iya'a.”
“Batomundo'anna Surugaa iya'a uga' koi puka' men nita'an na danau, kasi noko'ule' susum men biai' kaliangan.
Sarataa a puka' iya'a nobuke'mo susum, ia leengketmo mian a puka' iya'a na katano'an. Kasi i raaya'a nongoruangkon ka' nungururuki susum iya'a. Men ma'amat ni'isiikonmo na karandang, men ba'idekna nibalo'konmo.
Koiya'a uga' a kakabusanna tempo. Malaa'ikat bo taka mengerensakon mian men ba'idek a gau'na ka' mian men malolo' na pingkira'na Alaata'ala.
Kasi mian men ba'idek a gau'na iya'a bo tibarkonon na apu men leaambangan. Indo'o i raaya'a bo tumando' ka' marepa tuu'.”
Yesus nimikirawarimo murit-Na tae-Na, “Too daa kuu inti'imo a giigii' timbaani' iya'a?” Ia simbati i raaya'a taena, “Daa, inti'ionmaimo!”
Taeni Yesus, “Sanda' wawa ukum Torat men nongololo'mo pisiso'na Batomundo'anna Surugaa, ia nipookokoikon koi sa'angu' tombono laigan men nunguarkon kupang men u'uru tia kupang men manau' na tampat men nanganaa'anna.”
Noko daa i Yesus nuntundunkon timbaani' iya'a, Ia namarereimo dodongoan iya'a.
Ia nomule'konmo na dodongoan-Na. Indo'o i Ia nomae'mo mimisiso' mian na laigan bakitumpuanna. Mian indo'o men nomorongori i Ia kosamba'an tuu'. Taena i raaya'a, “Maana nantausian-Na pinginti'ian tia kuasa mangawawau upa kosamba'?
Taasi' i Ia anakna i tukang? Taasi' i Maria a sina-Na, ka' moto'utus tii Yakobus, Yusuf, Simon ka' i Yudas?
Ka' taasi' giigii' utus-Na wiwine dumodongo iraani'i tii kita? Se' daa maana a nantausian-Na giigii' iya'a?”
Mbaka' i raaya'a bude' mangalaboti i Yesus. Kasi i Yesus norobu na ko'ona tae-Na, “Sa'angu' nabii mau mbariana angga'ionna mian, tongko' na kampung men dodongoanna, tia mianna sangkau laigan ia sian angga'ion.”
Mbaka' i Yesus sian nangawawau biai' upa kosamba' indo'o, gause i raaya'a sian parasaya.
Tempo i Yesus mimisiso' mian, lele-Na nokamporongoranmo ni Herodes men tomundo' na libutan Galilea.
Herodes norobumo na pagawena taena, “Sabole i Yohanes Pansarani inooro'o. Ia notuo'mo soosoodo noko daa lapus! Mbali' Ia kuasaan mangawawau upa kosamba'.”
Herodes norobu koiya'a gause mbaripian i ia nomosuu' nangarakop i Yohanes ka' numungu, ka' nonsoopkon na tarungkuan. Herodes nangawawau koiya'a gause i ia nosuo' tii Herodias, boroki' ni Filipus utusna.
Wawau ni Herodes men koiya'a piribiai'mo ia kokundakon i Yohanes taena, “Sian sida i koo mangala i Herodias bo boroki'im!”
Bookoi i Herodes mingkira' mampapatei i Yohanes, kasee i ia layaonkon mian biai' gause pimiile'na i raaya'a i Yohanes koi sa'angu' nabii.
Na tempo i Herodes nangaramekon ilio men nongamea'anna, anak wiwine ni Herodias nosumoili'mo na aropna sawe' biai'. Wawauna iya'a nompopobeles noa ni Herodes.
Mbaka' i Herodes nobasumpa' bo mongorookon na ko'ona upapo a men pa'ase'onna.
Gause asuionna sinana, mbaka' anak wiwine iya'a norobumo taena, “Yaku' mama'ase' takala' ni Yohanes Pansarani wawakonon na ingku' koikoini'ina tanaon na dulang!”
Sarataa nongorongor pa'ase'na iya'a, Herodes nasiongo'mo. Gause i ia nobasumpa'mo rongo-rongor sawe'na, uga' somo ia loloikon a pa'ase'na anak wiwine iya'a.
Ia nomosuu'mo mian mae' na tarungkuan mongkolongi takala' ni Yohanes.
Noko daa iya'a, niwawamo a takala' ni Yohanes na dulang ka' nirookon na wiwine laandue' iya'a. Kasi ia wawakon iya'a na sinana.
Noko daa iya'a, murit ni Yohanes Pansarani notakamo nondolo' biibiina ka' nantanom. Kasi i raaya'a nomae' nambantilkon ni Yesus.
Sarataa i Yesus nomorongor lele iya'a, Ia nasawe'mo na duangan ka' namarerei dodongoan iya'a, mansarak tampat men oloa na mian biai'. Kasee sarataa ia inti'i mian se' koiya'a, raaya'a namarereimo kotana sanda-sanda', ka' nogintano' nuntuus i Yesus.
Sarataa i Yesus nalau na duangan ka' nimiile' mian biai' iya'a, Ia nolingu'mo. Mbaka' i Ia nengelesi'imo mian men manggeo men isian indo'o tia mian biai'.
Maamaalommo, murit ni Yesus nuntuu'imo i Ia ka' norobu taena, “Ilio boomo sopok, ka' tampat kani'i oloa na dodongoanna mian. Mbulo posuu' a mian karaani'i bi rae' kada' daa i raaya'a sida mingili kakaan na kampung.”
Kasee taeni Yesus, “Sian sakat i raaya'a mae'. Kuusi a mantarai i raaya'a kakaan.”
Taena, “Kai tongko' isian roti lilima' ka' susum rurua'!”
Taeni Yesus, “Le'emarikon na Ingku'!”
Kasi i Yesus nomosuu' mian biai' iya'a umoruang na rakut. Noko daa iya'a, ia alamo i Yesus a roti lilima ka' susum men rurua' iya'a, kasi nolumelengea' waara'a langit ka' nobasukuur na Alaata'ala. Noko daa iya'a Ia rumpi-rumpikmo a roti iya'a ka' nongorookon na murit-Na kada' bo obo-oboskonon na mian biai' iya'a.
Raaya'a wiwi'na nobenteng nangkaan. Ka' labina roti men nikaan iya'a ia ruru' murit ni Yesus, dauga' nobuke' sampulo' rua' basung.
Mian moro'one men nangkaan roti iya'a isian toro lima' loloon mian, sianpo tonsoop tia wiwine ka' anak morio'.
Noko daa koiya'a ai Yesus liuliu nomosuu' murit-Na mae' baduangan mongolukoni i Ia na sambotakna danau. Kasi mian men biai' iya'a Ia posuu'mo mule'kon.
Sarataa nomae'mo a mian biai' iya'a, Yesus nolumoponmo suungna na buu'na ka' nosambayang. Pataka malom i Yesus dauga' inda'a suungna.
Duangan men ia lakiti murit ni Yesus noko toropiimo kilo a ko'oloana namarerei katano'an, ka' pailumbu'onna golong-golong gause sumpale'onna mombuul.
Toro jaam tiga karani' ilio notakamo i Yesus na ko'ona i raaya'a tumpa-tumpang na wawona weer.
Sarataa murit ni Yesus nimiile' i Ia notumumpang na wawona weer, tongkodi' tuu' i raaya'a. Raaya'a nangkakaro'mo nolayaon. Taena, “Tile'e santuo'!”
Kasee liuliu ia simbati i Yesus tae-Na, “Porampot a noamuu! Yaku' ini'i. Alia layaon!”
Kasi i Petrus norobu taena, “Tumpu, kalu tuutuu' i Yesus i Kuu, leelo' ansee i yaku' nooro'o na Ko'omuu tumumpang na wawona weer!”
Ia simbati i Yesus tae-Na, “Mai!” Mbaka' nalaumo i Petrus na duangan, ka' notumumpang na wawona weer nuntuu'i i Yesus.
Kasee sarataa ia suri i Petrus se' makorong a mombuul na danau iya'a, ia nolayaonmo ka' nuntumbeimo tololop. Mbaka' ia nangkakaro'mo taena, “Tumpu, kaba'on!”
Yesus liuliu nondoekon lima-Na ka' ningintoni i Petrus. Kasi i Ia norobu tae-Na, “Wee i koo men sian laan parasaya! Nongko'upa i koo se' dauga' raranga' na Ingku'?”
Sarataa i raaya'a nasawe' na duangan, mombuul norokotmo.
Mbaka' murit ni Yesus men na duangan iya'a nonsoosa'mo i Ia. Taena i raaya'a, “Kuu tuutuu' Anakna Alaata'ala!”
Sarataa nolumembet na sambotakna danau, raaya'a notakamo na Genesaret.
Tongko' ia piile' mian men iraando'o se' i Yesus a men notaka, raaya'a nengelelekonmo na giigii' kota men pookarani' tia Genesaret. Kasi giigii' mian men manggeo niwawamo ni Yesus.
Raaya'a nama'ase' kada' patalaion mongkoyong juba-Na, mau tongko' puusna. Kasi giigii' men nongkoyong juba-Na sida nalesi'.
Kasi toropii mian Farisi tia wawa ukum Torat na Yerusalem notaka ni Yesus. Raaya'a nobapikirawar taena,
“Nongko'upa a murit-Muu se' munguluani adatna pulinta? Raaya'a sian mingoso' kutung kalu kumaan, koi men adatna pulinta!”
Ia simbati i Yesus tae-Na, “Nongko'upa se' i kuu munguluani posuu'na Alaata'ala tongko' se' montookon mongololo' adatna pulimuu?
Gause isian wurungna Alaata'ala nangaan tae-Na, ‘Angga'i a tama tia sinamuu!’ Ka', tae-Na, ‘Ai ime a men mantadeankon tamana kabai se' sinana tiodaa pate a ukumanna.’
Kasee i kuu isian pisiso'muu se' mian sida mambantilkon na tamana kabai se' sinana men koi kani'imari: ‘Giigii' upa men tio bo rookononku na ko'omuu, yaku' poko kurbaankonmo na Alaata'ala.’
Mbaka' i kuu sianmo sakat mangangga'i tama tia sinamuu. Kuu sianmo mongololo' wurungna Alaata'ala kada' bi mongololo' adatna pulimuu.
Wee i kuu mian men minti pa'a-pa'agama! Tuutuu' a men ia tulis i Nabii Yesaya muntundun i kuu, taena,
‘Mian karaani'i muntunde' i Yaku' tongko' na wewerna, see noana i raaya'a oloa na Ingku'.
Sianta kana'na i raaya'a monsoosa' i Yaku', gause aturanna mian a pisiso'kononna koikoi se' aturan iya'a a aturan-Ku.’ ”
Kasi i Yesus nengeleelo' mian biai' ka' norobu na ko'ona tae-Na,
“Porongori pore-pore kada' inti'ionmuu! Taasi' men minsoop na nganga' a men mengerere wakana mian, kasee wurung ba'idek men umuar na nganga' a men mengerere wakana mian.”
Mbaka' murit ni Yesus nuntuu'imo i Ia ka' nimikirawar taena, “Inti'ion-Muu se' mian Farisi kokoo'an tempo i raaya'a nongorongor wurung-Muu?”
Ia simbati i Yesus tae-Na, “Giigii' aso-asok men taasi' ia asok Tamang-Ku men na surugaa bo bubution-Na tiwaka-wakatna.
Patalai i raaya'a. Raaya'a mase koi mian mampisok men mangalambin mian mampisok. Kalu mian mampisok mangalambin mian mampisok, sabole rua-rua'na mandawo' na bolo'.”
Kasi i Petrus norobu na Ko'ona taena, “Kai mikisiso'kon aratina timbaani' men mengerere wakana mian.”
Ia simbati i Yesus tae-Na, “Sianpo inti'ionmuu mbali'?
Sianpo kuu inti'i se' giigii' kakaan men minsoop na nganga' waaro'o na kompong ka' bo uarkonon soosoodo.
Kasee upa ba'idek men umuar na nganga' sabole mimpu'u na noa, ka' iya'a a men mengerere wakana mian.
Gause na noa a nimpu'uanna giigii' pikiran men ba'idek. Pikiran koiya'a a men manggau'kon mian mampapatei mian, muntumpangkon samba-samba, mogora', mamangan, momborekkon mian, ka' momotaekon.
Raanono'mo a men mengerere wakana mian. Kasee kumaan men sian mingoso' sian mengerere wakana mian.”
Kasi i Yesus namarerei Genesaret ka' nomae' na libutan men karani' na kota Tirus tia kota Sidon.
Sa'angu' wiwine na libutan iya'a men samba Kana'an notaka ni Yesus ka' norobu boolak taena, “Tumpu, lee' ni Daud! Kolingu'konon i yaku'! Anakku wiwine lampingionna meena. Ia marepa tuu'.”
Kasee i Yesus sian ninsimbati wiwine iya'a. Kasi murit-Na nuntuu'i i Ia ka' nama'ase' taena i raaya'a, “Posuu' a wiwine kale'e mae'. Ia tongko' lolo-lolo' na komburi'ta ka' monggora'i!”
Ia simbati i Yesus tae-Na, “Yaku' niposuu' tongko' bona lipu' Israel, men koi domba nopenta'.”
Kasee wiwine iya'a nuntuu'imo i Yesus ka' nobanintuur, kasi norobu taena, “Tumpu, tulungon i yaku'!”
Ia simbati i Yesus tae-Na, “Sianta kana' a mangala kakaanna anak morio' ka' mintibarkon bona au'.”
Taena wiwine iya'a, “Indo' Tumpu, kasee au'po mangkaan puputna kakaan men mandawo' na meja'na tombonona.”
Mbaka' ia simbati i Yesus tae-Na, “Naung, balaki' tuu' a imaawan na Ingku'! Bi sida na ko'oom koi men kikira'am!” Mbaka' na tempopo iya'a, anakna wiwine iya'a nalesi'mo.
Yesus namarereimo libutan iya'a, kasi nomae' moso'ole na Danau Galilea. Noko daa iya'a, Ia nolumoponmo na buu'na ka' no'umoruang inda'a.
Biai' a mian notaka na Ko'ona nangawawa mian men repo', mian men pepa', mian men mampisok, men umu', ka' biai' a mian soosoodo men isian nggeo sambana. Raaya'a nomokelamo mian men manggeo na arop ni Yesus ka' mian biai' men manggeo iya'a ia lesi'imo i Yesus.
Mbaka' nosamba'mo a mian biai' men iraando'o gause nimiile' mian men umu' norobumo, men pepa' nalesi'mo, men repo' nolumempangmo, ka' men mampisok nopoopiile'mo. Kasi i raaya'a nuntunde' Alaata'ala men soosa'onna lipu' Israel.
Kasi i Yesus nengeleelo' murit-Na ka' norobu tae-Na, “Molingu' tuu' i Yaku' na mian biai' karaani'i. Tolungiliomo i raaya'a kamba'a tii Yaku', kasee sianta kakaanan. Ka' sian pokoon-Ku a momosuu' i raaya'a mule'kon tilolu, dako' poso' na salan.”
Kasi murit ni Yesus nobapikirawar na Ko'ona, taena, “Koi upa a bo pantausian kakaan na tampat kani'i men oloa na mian bo pamakaanta mian men biai' tuu' karaaya'a?”
Ia simbati i Yesus tae-Na, “Pipii a roti men isian na ko'omuu?” Taena, “Pipitu', tia susum morio' toropii.”
Mbaka' ia posuu'mo i Yesus a mian biai' iya'a umoruang na tano'.
Kasi i Ia ala a roti pipitu' roti tia susum iya'a ka' nobasukuur na Alaata'ala. Noko daa koiya'a, Ia rumpi-rumpikmo, kasi nirookon na murit-Na. Mbaka' ia obo-oboskonmo i raaya'a na mian biai' iya'a.
Giigii' mian iya'a benteng nokumaan. Lapas nokumaan, raaya'a ningirimpungmo labina kakaan iya'a. Labina iya'a dauga' nobuke' pitu' basung.
Men nokumaan na tempo iya'a moro'one koi paat loloon mian, sianpo tonsoop men wiwine tia anak morio'.
Kasi i Yesus nomosuu' mian biai' iya'a mule'kon. Ia nolumakitmo na sa'angu' duangan ka' notarabut paraas libutan Magadan.
Kasi toropii mian Farisi tia mian Saduki notaka ni Yesus mingkira' mimitopongi i Ia. Raaya'a mama'ase' kada' i Yesus mangawawau upa kosamba' bookoi oos se' i Ia notaka nda'ara'amari na Alaata'ala.
Kasee ia simbati i Yesus tae-Na, “Kalu maamaalom piile'onmuu langit memea', kuu mangaan se' bo pengkar liila.
Ka' kalu ma'ulo-ulop piile'onmuu langit memea' ka' antongon, kuu mangaan se' bo usan kodi' ini'i. Kuu minginti'i mimiile' oosan na langit pataka i kuu minginti'i upa men bo sida, kasee i kuu sian minginti'i mimiile' upa men ia limang Alaata'ala na tempo koini'i!
Mian men tumuo' na tempo koini'i ba'idek tuu' ka' sian malolo'! Raaya'a mama'ase' sa'angu' upa kosamba' kada' i raaya'a mamarasaya i Yaku', kasee i raaya'a sian taraion sa'angu'po upa kosamba' saliwakon upa kosamba' koi men nosida ni Nabii Yunus.” Noko daa norobu koiya'a, Yesus nomae'mo namarerei i raaya'a.
Kasi i Yesus tia murit-Na nolumembet na Danau Galilea, kasee murit-Na nolimbo' nangawawa roti.
Yesus norobu na ko'ona tae-Na, “Pore-pore ka' maka'amat i kuu na ragina mian Farisi tia mian Saduki.”
Raaya'a nuntumbeimo pootunduni taena, “Ai Ia nangaan koiya'a gause i kita sian nangawawa roti.”
Kasee i Yesus ninginti'i upa men pootunduniikononna i raaya'a mbali' i Ia norobu tae-Na, “Wee i kuu men sian laan parasaya! Nongko'upa i kuu se' tongko' momootunduniikon sianta roti?
Sia-siannapo mbali' kuu inti'i? Sianmo mbali' kuu oos a roti lilima' men Yaku' rumpi-rumpik bona mian lima' loloon? Kasi pipii basung a labina roti men kuu rimpung?
Ka' koi upa a pipitu' roti men bona paat loloon mian? Pipii basung a labina men kuu rimpung?
Nongko'upa i kuu se' dauga' sian minginti'i se' taasi' roti a men tundunon-Ku? Kasee maka'amat i kuu na ragina mian Farisi tia mian Saduki!”
Na temposi iya'a kasi ia inti'i murit-Na se' i Yesus nambantili i raaya'a kada' maka'amat na pisiso'na mian Farisi tia mian Saduki, taasi' na ragi men bo pangawawau roti.
Kasi i Yesus tia murit-Na nomae' na libutan Kaisarea Filipi. Yesus nimikirawarimo murit-Na tae-Na, “Koi taena mian, ime mbali' a Anak Manusia?”
Ia simbati i raaya'a taena, “Isian men mangaan ai Yohanes Pansarani. Men sambana mangaan a i Elia. Ka' men sambana mangaan se' i Yeremia, kabai se' sa'angu' mian na giigii' nabii.”
Taeni Yesus soosoodo, “Kasee ka' na ko'omuu, ai ime i Yaku' kani'i?”
Ia simbati i Simon Petrus taena, “Kuu a Tomundo' Pansalamatkon, Anakna Alaata'ala, Alaata'ala Men Tumuo'.”
Kasi taeni Yesus, “Barakaatan i koo, Simon anak ni Yunus! Gause taasi'po mian a men ninsiso'kon na ko'oom, kasee Tamang-Ku men na surugaa.
Mbali' iya'a, bantilkonon-Ku na ko'oom se' i koo Petrus, koi watu men moonggor. Ka' na wawona watu kani'i a bo pomokereran-Ku jama'at-Ku, men sian pokoonna dodongoanna mian lapus tuaion!
Bo rookonon-Ku na ko'oom a kuncina Batomundo'anna Surugaa. Upa men koo kokundakon bo wawauonna mian na tano' balaki' kani'i, ia poko kokundakonmo Alaata'ala na surugaa. Ka' upa men koo patalaikon bo wawauonna mian na tano' balaki', ia poko patalaikonmo Alaata'ala na surugaa.”
Noko daa iya'a ai Yesus nomotoomo murit-Na kada' alia mambantilkon mau ni imepo se' i Iamo a Tomundo' Pansalamatkon.
Noko daa koiya'a, ai Yesus nuntumbeimo mompopo'inti'ikon na murit-Na se' i Ia tio mae' na Yerusalem, ka' na Yerusalem motu-motu'a, tanaasna imam, ka' wawa ukum Torat bo mengerepai i Ia. Ia bo papateion, kasee na ilio kotolu'na bo potuo'ion.
Kasee i Petrus nangawawa i Yesus waale'e na soripi'na ka' nongkomaso'i, taena, “Tumpu, sulano Alaata'ala mongoloakon men koiya'a! Men koiya'a sabole sian sida na Ko'omuu!”
Yesus ningilingamo i Petrus ka' norobu na ko'ona tae-Na, “Kumbaale'ena i koo, Ibiliis! Koo mantalantangi i Yaku'. Pinginti'iim kanono' pinginti'ina mian, taasi' pinginti'na Alaata'ala.”
Kasi i Yesus norobu na murit-Na, tae-Na, “Mian men mingkira' mongololo' i Yaku' tiodaa mongkolimbo'kon pingkira'na noana kasi mamasa'an saliipna ka' mongololo' i Yaku'.
Gause mian men mampari-pari mansalamatkon wakana na tano' balaki' kani'i, ia sian mantausi tutuo' men pore. Kasee mian men mongorookon wakana bo Ingku', ia bo mantausi tutuo' men pore.
Aupa mbali' a ee'na men takakononna mian mau ia montombonoi longkop tano' balaki' kasee komburi'na sian mantausi tutuo' men pore? Sianta upa men umangga' men sida pombolosi tutuo' men pore iya'a.
Gause Anak Manusia bo taka soosoodo tia malaa'ikat-Na. Ia bo taka tia kuasana Tama-Na, ka' na tempo iya'a, Ia bo mangawalos giigii' mian koi wawauna.
Imamat a men taeng-Ku', ka' uga' bantilkonon-Ku na ko'omuu se' isian i kuu men daa mokaraani'i men sianpo lapus kalu koo'po mimiile' Anak Manusia taka bo pontomundo'i na batomundo'an-Na.”
Koi noommo ilio a noporusanna, Yesus nangawawamo i Petrus ka' i Yakobus tia utusna men i Yohanes nasawe' na buu'na sa'angu' men alayo'. Sianta mian sambana indo'o.
Kasi dudus ni Yesus nokoboliian na aropna i raaya'a. Ro'upna notarangmo somo koi ilio, ka' juba-Na nosidamo bubulak tamban dingkalapan.
Kasi totolu' murit-Na nimiile' i Musa tii Elia pintanga' batundun tii Yesus.
Mbaka' taeni Petrus na ko'ona i Yesus, “Tumpu, ma'amat tuu' i kita isian na tampat kani'i. Kalu Kuu mingkira', daa bo pokereriionku sa'up totolu' ka'ita, sa'angu' bo Ko'omuu, sa'angu' boni Musa, ka' sa'angu' boni Elia.”
Pintanga' i Petrus morobu, nalaumo a antong men tarang nansa'upi i raaya'a, ka' na antong iya'a isian wurung men nokamporongoran nangaan taena, “Ni'imo a Anak-Ku men kolingu'-Ku. Ia men daa kokana'-Ku. Porongori i Ia!”
Sarataa a murit ni Yesus nongorongor men koiya'a, raaya'a nolayaonmo tuu' tamban notonsumpul na tano'.
Kasee i Yesus nembeelimo i raaya'a ka' nongkoyong, kasi norobu tae-Na, “Kekerer. Alia layaon!”
Sarataa i raaya'a notumangak, raaya'a sian nimiile' sa'angu'po mian, somo i Yesus suungna indo'o.
Tempo i raaya'a notumokuru na buu'na iya'a, Yesus nomotoomo i raaya'a tae-Na, “Alia montoobantilkonkuu ni imepo aupa men kuu piile' umba'a kalu Anak Manusia sianpo potuo'ion moko daa lapus.”
Murit-Na nobapikirawarmo na Ko'ona taena, “Kalu koiya'a, nongko'upa a wawa ukum Torat muntundun se' i Elia tio taka olukon koo'po tia kotakaan-Na Tomundo' Pansalamatkon?”
Ia simbati i Yesus tae-Na, “Ai Elia tuutuu' taka olukon, kada' giigii' upa bi toropot.
Ka' bantilkonon-Ku na ko'omuu se' i Elia noko takamo, see i ia sian inti'ionna mian. Raaya'a nangawawaukon i ia koi pingkira'na i raaya'a. Ka' koiya'a uga' a pangawawauna i raaya'a Anak Manusia.”
Ya'asi ka' ia inti'i murit-Na se' i Yesus nuntundun i Yohanes Pansarani men koi i nabii Elia.
Sarataa i Yesus tia murit-Na totolu' nomule'kon na mian biai' iya'a, notakamo a sa'angu' moro'one nobanintuur nonsoosa' i Yesus.
Moro'one iya'a norobumo taena, “Tumpu, kolingu'konon a anakku. Ia nikalo' ka' marepa tuu'. Ia malia' torimpa' na apu ka' mandawo' na weer.
Ia yaku' wawamo na murit-Muu, kasee i raaya'a sian nomoko nengelesi'i.”
Mbaka' ia simbatimo i Yesus tae-Na, “Alia uga' i kuu mian men tumuo' na tempo koini'i! Kuu tuutuu' mian men sian parasaya ka' men nosala'mo salan. Pataka ipi mbali' Yaku' tio dumodongo tii kuu? Pataka ipi mbali' i Yaku' tio mokotaan na upa men wawauonmuu? Wawa a anak kanono' le'emari!”
Kasi i Yesus nengerengeaki meena men nangalampingi anak iya'a. Mbaka' no'umuarmo a meena iya'a ka' anak iya'a liuliu nalesi'.
Sarataa somo raaraaya'ana, murit ni Yesus nuntuu'imo i Ia kasi nobapikirawar taena, “Nongko'upa i kai se' sian nomoko numbuse'i meena iya'a?”
Ia simbati i Yesus tae-Na, “Kuu sian nomoko gause i kuu sian laan parasaya. Imamat a men taeng-Ku', ka' uga' bantilkonon-Ku na ko'omuu se' kalu i kuu imaanan mau tongko' koi kobalaki'na watuna sasawi, kuu momoko momosuu' buu'na kaya'a, ‘Balimba' kande'e!’ mbaka' sabole balimba' a buu'na kaya'a. Ka' sianta sa'angu'po a upa men sian pokoonmuu wawauon! [
Kasee meena men koi umba'a sian pokoon buse'ion kalu sian sambayang ka' ba'apata.]”
Sarataa i Yesus tia murit-Na nobarimpung na Galilea, Yesus norobumo na murit-Na tae-Na, “Sianmo paraa manau' a Anak Manusia bo rookonon na kuasana mian.
Ia bo papateionna i raaya'a, kasee na ilio kotolu'na Ia bo potuo'ion.” Mbaka' nasiongo'mo tuu' a murit-Na.
Sarataa ari Yesus tia murit-Na notaka na Kapernaum, pagawe pajakna Laiganna Alaata'ala notakamo ni Petrus ka' nobapikirawar taena, “Gurumuu se' mambayar pajakna Laiganna Alaata'ala kabai sian?”
Ia simbati i Petrus taena, “Daa, mambayar!” Sarataa i Petrus ninsoop na laigan, ai Yesus nongolukonimo nimikirawari i ia. Tae-Na, “Simon, koi upa pinginti'iim? Ime a men tio mambayar pajak bona tomundo' na tano' balaki' kani'i? Mianna kabai se' mian sambana?”
Ia simbati i Petrus taena, “Mian sambana.” Taeni Yesus soosoodo, “Kalu koiya'a rayat sakat mambayar pajak.
Kasee kada' i kita sian mingidek noana i raaya'a, mbaka' i koo posuu'on-Ku bapeka na danau. Ala a susum men olukon koo poko'ule'. Bongkati a nganga'na mbaka' i koo bo mantausi doi' men saa'na paat dirham bo pambayar pajaak tia pajak-Ku. Ala a doi' iya'a ka' bayar a pajakta.”
Na tempopo iya'a, notakamo a murit ni Yesus nobapikirawar na Ko'ona. Taena i raaya'a, “Ime a men balaki'na na Batomundo'anna Surugaa?”
Mbaka' i Yesus nengeleelo'mo sa'angu' anak morio' kasi Ia pokerer a anak iya'a na aropna i raaya'a.
Kasi i Yesus norobu tae-Na, “Kada' bo inti'ionmuu: Bantilkonon-Ku na ko'omuu se' kalu i kuu sian mombolii gau'muu pataka sida koi anak morio' kani'i, kuu sian minsoop na Batomundo'anna Surugaa.
Mian men mompopokoo' wakana ka' sida koi anak morio' kani'i, iamo a men balaki'na na Batomundo'anna Surugaa.
Ime a men mangalaboti sa'angu' anak morio' koi kani'i gause mian iya'a mongololo' pisiso'-Ku, nono' a men ngaanon mangalaboti i Yaku'.”
“Kasee ime a men manggau'kon sa'angu' anak morio' karaani'i men parasaya na Ingku' sida baradosa, mbulokon mian iya'a kootiion watu pinggiling na toure'na, kasi pololopon na tobui men alalom.
Silaka' a dunia kani'i, gause isian upa-upa men manggau'kon mian baradosa. Daa mba'a uga' a upa-upa men koiya'a sabole sinampang isian, kasee silaka' a mian men mingilimang iya'a.
Too limamuu kabai se' saratmuu a manggau'kon i kuu baradosa, kolongi ka' balo'kon. Mbulokon limamuu kabai se' saratmuu somo sambotak kasee daa tumuo' tia Alaata'ala pookokoikonon tia limamuu kabai se' saratmuu sampa kasee i kuu tibarkonon na apu men sian kopate-pateanna.
Too matamuu a manggau'kon i kuu baradosa, kuati ka' balo'kon a matamuu inono'! Mbulokon i kuu mampisok sambotak kasee daa tumuo' tia Alaata'ala pookokoikonon tia dauga' isian rua-rua'na matamuu kasee i kuu tibarkonon na apuna naraka.”
“Imamat pore-pore ini'imari! Alia sian mangangga'i sa'angu'po anak morio'. Bantilkonon-Ku na ko'omuu se' malaa'ikatna i raaya'a sinampang poopoopiile' tia Tamang-Ku men na surugaa. [
Gause Anak Manusia taka bo pansalamatkon mian men sian minginti'i Tumpu!]
Koi upa mbali' a pinginti'imuu? Kalu isian mian sa'angu' men dombaan sa'atu, ka' sa'angu' dombana iya'a nopenta', upa ansee a men bo wawauonna mian iya'a? Sabole parereionna kutung a domba men siompulo' sio' iya'a na buu'na, ka' mae' mansarak sa'angu' domba men nopenta' iya'a.
Imamat a men taeng-Ku', ka' uga' bantilkonon-Ku na ko'omuu se' kalu tausionnamo a domba men nopenta' iya'a, sabole pongkobeleskonna sa'angu' domba men nopenta' iya'a labi tia pongkobeleskonna siompulo' sio' domba sambana men sian nopenta'.
Koiya'a uga' a Tamamuu men na surugaa sian kikira'-Na kalu isian sa'angu' anak morio' karaani'i sida penta'.”
“Kalu utusmuu sa'angu' kaparasaya'an nangawawau dosa, rae' ka' bantili i ia men tongko' rua' kuu daamo. Kalu porongorionna a bantilimuu, mbaka' wawamuu sida pore soosoodo.
Kasee kalu ia sian momorongori i kuu, angekon soosoodo sa'angu' kabai se' rurua' mian. Gause na Alkitaap isian nitulis koi kani'imari: ‘Titiu'namo rurua' kabai se' totolu' mian a men bo pinginti'ian too tuutuu' a mian sala'an kabai se' sian.’
Kalu sian porongorionna a bantilina mian iya'a, bantilkon na jama'at. Ka' komburi'na, kalu sia-siannapo porongorionna a bantilina mian na jama'at iya'a, galalmo i ia koi sa'angu' mian men sian minginti'i Alaata'ala kabai se' koi pagawena pajak.”
“Imamat a men taeng-Ku', ka' uga' bantilkonon-Ku na ko'omuu se' upa men kuu kokundakon bo wawauonna mian na tano' balaki' kani'i ia poko kokundakonmo Alaata'ala na surugaa. Ka' upa men kuu patalaikon bo wawauonna mian na tano' balaki' kani'i, ia poko patalaikonmo Alaata'ala na surugaa.
Bantilkonon-Ku uga' na ko'omuu kalu isian rua' mian na tano' balaki' kani'i nopoo'akoori mama'ase' upa-upa, sabole pa'ase'na i raaya'a bo loloikononna Tamang-Ku men na surugaa.
Kalu isian rurua' kabai se' totolu' mian barimpung gause i raaya'a mian-Ku, Yaku' sabole isian tii raaya'a.”
Kasi notaka i Petrus nobapikirawar ni Yesus taena, “Kalu utusku sa'angu' kaparasaya'an mangawawau dosa na ingku', tio piripii yaku' mangampuni i ia? Pataka piripitu'?”
Ia simbati i Yesus tae-Na, “Sian. Bantilkonon-Ku na ko'omuu se' taasi' tongko' piripitu', kasee tio pitumpulo' kali pipitu'!
Gause Batomundo'anna Surugaa koi timbaani' kani'imari. Isian sa'angu' tomundo' men mama'ase' mansaa' samayana tutulungina.
Na tempo i ia muntumbei mansaa', niwawamo na ko'ona a sa'angu' tutulungi men samayaon sompulo' loloon doi' mosoni.
Kasee samayana mian iya'a sianmo pokoonna bontorion. Mbaka' tomundo' nomosuu'mo kada' mian iya'a balukkononmo tia anakna ka' boroki'na ka' uga' giigii' upana, kada' bo pombontori samayana.
Mbali' iya'a, tutulungi iya'a nobanintuurmo monsoosa' tomundo' iya'a, ka' nama'ase' taena, ‘Tuan, taraion tempo i yaku'! Yaku' bo mombontori giigii' samayangku.’
Mbaka' nolingu'mo a tomundo' iya'a, mbali' ia sapuimo a giigii' samayana mian iya'a kasi nipatalai nomae'.
Sarataa no'umuar a tutulungi iya'a, ia nopootuungmo tia simbaya'na men uga' tutulungi. Simbaya'na iya'a samayaon sa'atu doi' dinar na ko'ona. Ia rakopmo a simbaya'na men samayaon iya'a ka' nipegot, kasi norobu taena, ‘Bontori a giigii' samayaam na ingku'!’
Kasi nobanintuur a simbaya'na iya'a ka' nama'ase na ko'ona taena, ‘Taraion tempo i yaku'! Yaku' bo mombontori samayangku!’
Kasee i ia kunda koiya'a. Ia nangatormo simbaya'na men samayaon iya'a bo tarungkuon pataka kobontorian a samayana.
Sarataa tutulungi sambana nimiile' upa men nosida, raaya'a nolingu'mo, kasi i raaya'a nambantilkon na tomundo'.
Mbaka' tomundo' iya'a nomosuu'mo nengeleelo' tutulungi iya'a ka' norobu na ko'ona taena, ‘Noaam se' ba'idek tuu'! Taasi' giigii' samayaam yaku' sapuimo gause koi pa'ase'em na ingku'?
Kalu koiya'a i koo uga' tio molingu'kon simbaya'am koi i yaku' nolingu'kon i koo!’
Tomundo' iya'a nomaso'mo tuu' ka' nomosuu' kada' tutulungi men ba'idek a noana iya'a papolosion ka' soopkonon na tarungkuan pataka bontorionna a giigii' samayana.”
Kasi taeni Yesus, “Koiya'a uga' a Tamang-Ku men na surugaa bo mongkoiya'akon i kuu kalu i kuu sian maloos a noamuu mangampuni utusmuu sa'angu' kaparasaya'an.”
Noko daa i Yesus nambantilkon pisiso'-Na, Ia namarereimo Galilea ka' nomae' na libutan Yudea na sambotakna Weerkauna Yordan.
Biai' a mian men nongololo' i Ia, ka' i raaya'a ia lesi'i i Yesus indo'o.
Kasi notaka a toropii mian Farisi mimitopongi i Yesus. Raaya'a nobapikirawarmo taena, “Koi upa pinginti'i-Muu? Too poturangon a moro'one mengerensai boroki'na mau mune' upapo a pongkokundaianna?”
Ia simbati i Yesus tae-Na, “Sianpo mbali' i kuu nambasa na Alkitaap se' i Ia men ninsidakon mian tumbena ninsidakon i raaya'a moro'one tia wiwine?
Noko daa Ia ninsidakon mian Ia norobu tae-Na, ‘Mbali' iya'a, moro'one bo mamarerei tamana tia sinana ka' mosa'angu' tia boroki'na, mbaka' rua' mian iya'a nosidamo koi sa'angu' waka.’
Mbaka' moro'one tia boroki'na taasi'mo rurua' kasee sa'angu'. Mbali' iya'a, upa men ia posa'angu'mo Alaata'ala sian sida rensaonna mian.”
Kasi mian Farisi nobapikirawar soosoodo, taena, “Kalu koiya'a, nongko'upa i Musa se' nomosuu' mian mantarai surat poorensaanna suo' bona boroki'na men ia rensai?”
Ia simbati i Yesus tae-Na, “Ai Musa nomoturang i kuu mengerensai boroki'muu gause i kuu bingilan. Kasee men tumbena taasi' koiya'a.
Bantilkonon-Ku na ko'omuu se' ime a men mengerensai boroki'na see boroki'na iya'a sian nogora', kasi langkai'na iya'a mosuo' soosoodo tia wiwine sambana, mbaka' moro'one iya'a muntumpangkon.”
Murit ni Yesus norobumo taena i raaya'a, “Kalu koiya'a poowawana mian men motosamba, mbulokon alia mosuo'.”
Ia simbati i Yesus tae-Na, “Wurung men koi kanooro'o sian giigii' mian sida mangalabot, kasee tongko' mian men ia tarai Tumpu pinginti'ian men koiya'a.
Isian mian men sian sida mosuo' gause i ia nongamea' men koiya'a. Isian uga' men sian sida mosuo' gause ia gau'kon mian. Ka' isian uga' men sian mosuo' gause pingkira'na suungna kada' sida balimang na Batomundo'anna Surugaa. Ime a men momoko mongololo' pisiso'-Ku kani'i, alaka' lolo'.”
Kasi isian mian nangawawa anak morio' waale'e ni Yesus kada' i Ia mengepetkon lima-Na ka' mansambayangkon i raaya'a. Kasee murit ni Yesus tongko' nongkomaso'i mian iya'a.
Mbaka' i Yesus norobumo na murit-Na tae-Na, “Patalai a anak karaanono' taka na Ingku'! Alia mantaankon i raaya'a, gause mian men koi anak karaani'i a men bo mianna Batomundo'anna Surugaa.”
Kasi i Yesus nengepetkon lima-Na na anak morio' iya'a ka' nambarakaati. Noko daa iya'a, kasi i Ia namarerei tampat iya'a.
Sa'angu' tempo isian sa'angu' moro'one notaka ni Yesus. Ia nobapikirawar taena, “Guru, wawau pore koi upa men tio bo wawauonku kada' mantausi tutuo' men pore pataka sidutu?”
Ia simbati i Yesus tae-Na, “Nongko'upa i koo se' mimikirawar na Ingku' upa men pore? Tongko' Sa'angu' a men pore. Kalu koo mingkira' mantausi tutuo' men pore, koo tio malolo' na potoona Alaata'ala.”
Taena mian iya'a, “Potoo men koi upa inooro'o?” Taeni Yesus, “Alia mampapatei mian, alia muntumpangkon samba-samba, alia mamangan ka' alia momborekkon mian.
Angga'i a tamaam tia sinaam, ka' kolingu'kon a simbaya'am mian koikoimo pongkolingu'koon wakaam.”
Taena anak malai moro'one, “Giigii' potoo kanooro'o yaku' poko loloikonmo. Dauga' upa soosoodo a men koo'po?”
Taeni Yesus, “Kalu koo mingkira' talakana a tutuo'om, rae' balukkon a giigii' upaam. Rookon a doi'na na mian men talalais. Kalu koiya'a, koo bo mokosue kupang na surugaa. Moko daa kasi taka mongololo' i Yaku'.”
Sarataa anak malai iya'a nongorongor wurung ni Yesus, ia nomae'mo. Noana masiongo' gause i ia biai' a kupangna.
Kasi i Yesus norobu na murit-Na tae-Na, “Imamat a men taeng-Ku. Bantilkonon-Ku na ko'omuu se' marepa tuu' a mian kupangon minsida mianna Batomundo'anna Surugaa.
Bantilkonon-Ku na ko'omuu soosoodo se' bagiakon sa'angu' unta minsoop na bolo'na pakaut a daana, tia sa'angu' mian kupangon minsida mianna Batomundo'anna Alaata'ala.”
Sarataa murit ni Yesus nongorongor men koiya'a, raaya'a nosamba'mo tuu'. Taena, “Ka' koiya'a, ai ime ansee a men sida salamatkonon?”
Yesus nintiokimo i raaya'a kasi norobu tae-Na, “Manusia sian momoko mansalamatkon wakana, kasee giigii' upa pokoonna Alaata'ala.”
Kasi i Petrus norobu ni Yesus taena, “Piile'! Kai namarereimo giigii' upamai ka' nongololo' i Kuu. Ansee upa bo tambomai?”
Ia simbati i Yesus tae-Na, “Tuutuu' mba'a. Ka' bantilkonon-Ku na ko'omuu se' na tempo Alaata'ala mungule'kon giigii' upa na dunia koi men tumbe, Anak Manusia bo umoruang na oruangan kobalaki'an-Na. Na tempo iya'a, kuu men nongololo'mo i Yaku' bo umoruang na sompulo' rua' oruangan kobalaki'an ka' mungukumi sompulo' rua' bense'na lipu' Israel!
Ka' giigii' mian men mamarerei laiganna, kabai mamarerei utusna wiwine ka' utusna men moro'one, kabai se' mamarerei tamana kabai sinana, kabai mamarerei anakna, kabai se' ale'na gause na pongololo'an i Yaku', mian iya'a bo moko'ule' soosoodo pirisa'atu paku'. Ka' i ia bo moko'ule' tutuo' men pore pataka sidutu.
Kasee biai' a mian men tongaan tempo koini'i bo kosian tongaan tempo ni'imarian. Ka' uga' mian men tempo koini'i piile'onta sianta tongaan, bo tongaan tempo ni'imarian.”
“Batomundo'anna Surugaa koi timbaani' kani'imari. Sa'angu' mian men tombono ale'na anggur no'umuar ma'ulo-ulop mae' mansarak mian bo balimang na ale'na.
Sarataa nosangada se' sangilio tambona sa'angu' doi' dinar, ia nomosuu'mo i raaya'a balimang na ale'na anggurna.
Toro jaammo sembilan ma'ulop, tombono ale' iya'a no'umuarmo soosoodo kasi nimiile' toropii mian men sian palimangonna iraando'o na tampat pobalukan ka' ba'ilianna mian.
Mbaka' i ia norobumo na ko'ona i raaya'a taena, ‘Rae' i kuu balimang na ale'na anggurku. Tamboionkusi i kuu tambo koi men kosidana.’ Mbaka' i raaya'a nomae'mo.
Toro jaam dua blaas tanga'iloa' ka' jaam tiga tobiling, tombono ale' iya'a no'umuarmo soosoodo ka' nangange mian balimang na ale'na.
Kasi toro jaam lima maamaalom, tombono ale' iya'a no'umuarmo soosoodo ka' nimiile' mian sambana men sian nobalimang. Ia norobumo na ko'ona i raaya'a taena, ‘Nongko'upa i kuu se' sangiliomo tongko' potorokot karaa'ita, sian balimang?’
Ia simbati i raaya'a taena, ‘Gause sianta mian men bo pangalaanmai tambo.’ Mbaka' ia posuu'mo tombono ale' iya'a taena, ‘Rae' i kuu uga' balimang na ale'ku.’
Guntumalommo, norobumo a tombono ale' iya'a na mian men mandagai mian balimang taena, ‘Leelo' a mian men nobalimang ka' rookon a tambona. Po'olukon a mian men ninsoop komburi', kasi mian men olukon ninsoop.’
Mbaka' notakamo a mian men nuntumbei balimang jaam lima. Raaya'a nitarai toro sa'angu'anna doi' dinar.
Kasi notaka soosoodo a mian men ma'ulo-uloppo a nuntumbeianna balimang. Raaya'a mansarui se' ko'ona a biai'na. Kasee i raaya'a uga' nitarai toro sa'angu'an doi' dinar.
Mbaka' sarataa nangalabot tambona, raaya'a nansasala'mo tombonona ale'.
Taena, ‘Mian men ninsoop komburi' tongko' nobalimang sa'angu' jaam. Kasee i kai men sumasangiliomo balimang marawat ka' ganggarionna pengkar. Mau mune' koiya'a tambona i raaya'a men kuu rookon koikoimo tia tambomai!’
Kasee tombono ale' iya'a ninsimbati sa'angu' mian men isian na ko'ona i raaya'a taena, ‘Utus! Sian sala' i yaku' na ko'oom. Taasi' i koo nosangadamo tamboion doi' sa'angu' salaka' sangilio?
Ala oboos ka' rae'! Yaku' nantarai tambona mian men ninsoop komburi' koikoimo tia tambo men yaku' rookon na ko'omuu gause koiya'a men kikira'ku.
Sian sida mbali' i yaku' bo pinginti'i upangku koi pingkira'ku? Kabai i koo masindir montookon yaku' mongkolingu'kon mian?’ ”
Kasi i Yesus norobu soosoodo tae-Na, “Kasee biai' a mian men sian angga'ion tempo koini'i bo angga'ion tempo ni'imarian, ka' biai' a mian men angga'ion tempo koini'i sianta angga'ion tempo ni'imarian.”
Banta-bantang ari Yesus mae' na Yerusalem, na tanga'na salan Ia nangangemo sompulo' rua' murit-Na barimpung raaraaya'ana. Yesus norobumo na murit-Na tae-Na,
“Imamat ini'imari! Koini'i kita banta-bantang mae' na Yerusalem, ka' Anak Manusia bo rookonon na tanaasna imam tia wawa ukum Torat. Ka' i raaya'a bo mungukum Anak Manusia tia ukuman pate.
Ia bo kalaakonon na mian men taasi' Yahudi. Ia bo irokion, sasalion, ka' saliipkonon. Kasee na ilio kotolu'na, Ia bo potuo'ion.”
Kasi sinana anak ni Zebedeus tia anakna notaka nuntuu'i i Yesus. Ia nobanintuurmo mama'ase' men kikira'na.
Yesus nimikirawarimo wiwine iya'a tae-Na, “Aupa men kikira'muu?” Ia simbati wiwine iya'a taena, “Kikira'ku a anakku rua' ira kani'i po'oruangon na batomundo'an-Muu, sa'angu' paraas uanan-Muu ka' sa'angu'na paraas kauri'-Muu.”
Taeni Yesus, “Kuu sian minginti'i upa men pa'ase'onmuu. Se' daa pokoonmuu a minginum na inuman repaan men tiodaa bo inumon-Ku?” Ia simbati i raaya'a taena, “Daa, pokoonmai!”
Taeni Yesus soosoodo, “Daa mba'a. Kuu bo minginum na inuman repaan men bo inumon-Ku. Kasee ime a men bo umoruang na uanan-Ku kabai se' na kauri'-Ku taasi' i Yaku' a men bo pinginti'i. Tamang-Ku a men bo pinginti'i mian men taraion-Na oruangan men Ia poko toropotikonmo iya'a.”
Nongorongor se' koiya'a, sompulo' murit ni Yesus nongkomaso'konmo i raaya'a rua' ira moto'utus.
Kasee i Yesus nengeleelo' i raaya'a ka' norobu tae-Na, “Kuu poto'inti'i se' pamarentana lipu' men sian minginti'i Alaata'ala mantalalais mianna. Ka' moomoola'na lipu' iya'a mamarenta mianna koi pingkira'na susuung.
Kasee i kuu amo' koiya'a. Kuu men mingkira' sida mian moola', kuu tio sida bo tutulungna mian.
Kuu men mingkira' tongaan na mian, kuu tio sida koi sa'angu' ata'na mian.
Koiya'a wawauna Anak Manusia. Ia notaka taasi' kalesangon. Ia taka mangkalesang ka' mongorookon noa-Na tia waka-Na papateion bo pontololoki dosana mian biai'.”
Sarataa i Yesus tia murit-Na namarerei Yerikho, mian biai' nobeormo nongololo' i Ia.
Isian rua' mian mampisok poto'oruang na soripi'na salan. Sarataa i raaya'a nongorongor se' i Yesus nolumiu, raaya'a nangkakaro'mo taena, “Tumpu, lee' ni Daud! Kolingu'konon i kai!”
Mian biai' iraando'o nongkokundakon i raaya'a ka' nomosuu' kada' mimporokot. Kasee rua' mian mampisok iya'a tongko' kaekae' momboolaki mangkakaro'. Taena, “Tumpu, lee' ni Daud! Kolingu'konon i kai!”
Mbaka' notaanmo i Yesus, kasi nengeleelo' ka' nimikirawari i raaya'a tae-Na, “Aupa men kikira'muu kada' wawauon-Ku na ko'omuu?”
Ia simbati i raaya'a taena, “Tumpu, kai mingkira' bi poopiile'!”
Yesus nolingu'konmo i raaya'a, mbaka' Ia koyongmo a matana i raaya'a. Na tempopo iya'a i raaya'a nopoopiile'mo. Kasi i raaya'a nongololo' i Yesus.
Sarataa i Yesus tia murit-Na montorumpakimo Yerusalem, indo'omo na kampung Betfage men na Buu'na Zaitun, Ia nomosuu'mo murit-Na rurua' mae' olukon,
ka' nomotoo tae-Na, “Rae' na kampung katu'u men torumpakionta Kuu bo liuliu mungurumpaki keledai wiwine men tootoongkon tia anakna rundara beebeel. Alaka' kakai a kokootna rua-rua'na ka' wawa tu'umari na Ingku'.
Kalu isian mian mongkosamba'i i kuu, bantilkon inta', ‘Tumpu mamaraluui. Ka' keledai iya'a sian paraa maalin daa ule'konon-Namo.’ ”
Tempo i Yesus nangawawau koiya'a, mbaka' nosidamo a wurungna Tumpu koi men ia tadulkon nabii men koi kani'imari:
“Bantilkon mian na kota Sion: Piile'! Tomundo'muu taka na ko'omuu. Ia ma'amat a noana ka' nolumakit na sa'angu' keledai wiwine lolo-lolo' a anakna.”
Mbaka' nomae'mo a rua' murit-Na iya'a ka' nangawawau koi men ia posuu'kon i Yesus.
Raaya'a nangawawamo keledai wiwine iya'a tia anakna rundara, kasi nangalatasi sengke'na tia jubana i raaya'a. Noko daa koiya'a, kasi i Yesus nolumakit.
Biai' a mian nanggampalkon bokukumna i raaya'a na salan, ka' men sambanaanna nongkolong panga' morio' ka' nendeer na salan.
Giigii' mian men potorae', mau men na olukon ka' men na komburi', mangkakaro'kon taena, “Tunde' a lee' ni Daud! Barakaatan i Ia men taka ia pokau Tumpu! Tunde' a Alaata'ala men na ko'alayo'an!”
Sarataa i Yesus ninsoop na Yerusalem, giigii' mian men na kota iya'a nogenggewumo. Taena, “Ime a mian kaya'a?”
Ia simbati mian men potololo' i Yesus taena i raaya'a, “Ni'imo i Nabii Yesus men ringkat na Nazaret libutan Galilea!”
Noko daa iya'a ai Yesus ninsoopmo Laiganna Alaata'ala ka' numbuse'i giigii' mian men ba'ili ka' men mobalu-baluk indo'o na tolodona Laiganna Alaata'ala. Meja'na mian men totolosi doi' ka' bangkona mian men mobaluk marampatii Ia tua-tua'kon.
Kasi i Yesus norobu na ko'ona tae-Na, “Na Alkitaap isian nitulis koi kani'imari: ‘Laigan-Ku tio ngaanon laigan bo basambayangan.’ Kasee kuu wawaumo bo dodongoanna mian puraga!”
Mian men mampisok tia mian men pepa' notaka ni Yesus na Laiganna Alaata'ala. Raaya'a ia lesi'i i Yesus.
Kasee tanaasna imam tia wawa ukum Torat nomaso'mo nimiile' upa kosamba' men ia wawau i Yesus. Ka' i raaya'a nomaso' nomorongor anak mangkakaro' na Laiganna Alaata'ala men taena, “Tunde' a lee' ni Daud!”
Raaya'a norobumo ni Yesus taena, “Koo nongorongor upa men taena i raaya'a?” Ia simbati i Yesus tae-Na, “Daa, Yaku' rongor! Kasee sianpo kuu basa mbali' a isiina Alkitaap men koi kani'imari: ‘Tumpu! Anak morio' tia men ngamea' Kuu poko pisiso'mo muntunde' i Kuu’?”
Noko daa iya'a ai Yesus namarereimo mian biai' no'umuar na kota, mae' na Betania kasi notokol indo'o.
Koi liilana ma'ulo-ulop, banta-bantang i Yesus mule'kon na Yerusalem, Ia nopoosurimo nololu.
Ia nimiile' kau ara sangkau na soripi'na salan, kasi nuntuu'i kau iya'a, kasee sianta sa'angu'po a woo'na men Ia tausi saliwakon roonana. Kasi i Yesus nomorobu na kau iya'a tae-Na, “Koo sianmo miwoo' pataka manau'!” Kau iya'a liuliu nalau.
Nimiile' upa men nosida iya'a, samba' a murit ni Yesus. Raaya'a nimikirawarmo taena, “Koi upa se' daa liuliu nalau a kau ara kale'e?”
Ia simbati i Yesus tae-Na, “Imamat a kau kale'e. Bantilkonon-Ku na ko'omuu se' kalu i kuu parasaya ka' sian babata, kuu sida mangawawau koi men Yaku' wawaumo na kau kale'e. Ka' taasi' tongko' koiya'a. Kuu uga' sida momosuu' buu'na kani'i, ‘Bi ko'akit ka' bi tombalo' i koo na tobui!’ mbaka' buu'na iya'a sabole balimba'.
Kalu i kuu parasaya, mau upa a men pa'ase'onmuu na Alaata'ala na sambayangmuu bo dapotonmuu.”
Kasi i Yesus nomule'kon na Laiganna Alaata'ala, ninsoop ka' nuntumbei nimisiso' indo'o. Pintanga' i Ia mimisiso', notakamo a tanaasna imam tia motu-motu'ana lipu' Yahudi bapikirawar. Taena i raaya'a, “Upa a pimpu'uaan nangawawau men koiya'a? Ka' ime a nantarai i Koo kuasa mbali' nangawawau giigii' iya'a?”
Ia simbati i Yesus tae-Na, “Yaku' uga' isian upa bo pikirawaron-Ku na ko'omuu. Alaka' simbati kada' bantilkonon-Ku i kuu se' kuasa ni ime mbali' daa i Yaku' mangawawau koiya'a.
Ime a men nantarai i Yohanes kuasa mansarani mian? Alaata'ala kabai mian?” Kasi tanaasna imam tia motu-motu'ana lipu' Yahudi nopootundunii raaraaya'ana, taena, “Kalu kita mangaan, ‘Kuasana ringkat na Alaata'ala,’ mbaka' simbation-Na, ‘Nongko'upa i kuu se' kosian mamarasaya upa men taeni Yohanes?’
Kasee kalu simbationta se' tia kuasana mian ansee i kita bo komaso'kononna mian biai' gause pimiile'na mian giigii' se' i Yohanes sa'angu' nabii.”
Mbaka' ia simbatimo i raaya'a taena, “Sian inti'ionmai!” Kasi taeni Yesus, “Kalu koiya'a Yaku' sian mambantilkon na ko'omuu se' kuasa ni ime bo pimpu'uan-Ku mangawawau koiya'a.”
Taeni Yesus, “Kasee koi upa pinginti'imuu timbaani' kani'imari? Isian sa'angu' mian men anakon moro'one rurua'. Ia nomae'mo na anakna men balaki'na ka' nomosuu' taena, ‘Rae' i koo balimang na ale'na anggur ilio kani'i!’
Ia simbati anakna taena, ‘Yaku' kunda!’ Kasee noko daa iya'a i ia ninsosolmo ka' nomae'mo na ale'na anggur.
Kasi tamana anak iya'a nomae' na anakna men korua'na ka' nomosuu' taena, ‘Rae' i koo balimang na ale'na anggur ilio kani'i!’ Ia simbati anak iya'a taena, ‘Daa, Papa!’ Kasee i ia sian nomae'.”
Yesus nimikirawarimo i raaya'a tae-Na, “Na rurua' anak iya'a, ime a men daa nongololoikon pingkira'na tamana?” Ia simbati i raaya'a taena, “Anak men balaki'na!” Taeni Yesus, “Tuutuu' mba'a. Ka' bantilkonon-Ku na ko'omuu se' pagawena pajak tia wiwine men eloon mongolukoni i kuu minsoop na Batomundo'anna Alaata'ala.
Gause i Yohanes Pansarani notaka bo pinsiso'kon i kuu tutuo' men daa kikira'na Alaata'ala, see i kuu sian mamarasaya pisiso'na. Pagawena pajak tia wiwine men eloon a men daa namarasaya i ia. Mau mune' i kuu nimiile'mo giigii' iya'a, kuu sian nonsosoli ka' nangkadarai gau'muu men ba'idek ka' sian namarasaya i ia.”
Taeni Yesus, “Porongor soosoodo a sa'angu' timbaani' kani'imari. Isian sa'angu' mian montombonoi tano' ka' tano'na iya'a ia asoki anggur. Ia nambalamo tiku-tikumna, ka' nengkeke bolo' bo pimiisan anggur, ka' nangawawau sa'up bo badagaian ale' iya'a. Kasi ia nantamboikon ale'na anggur iya'a na papalimang, ka' nomae' na lipu' sambana.
Tempo daa sidamo pumpupuan woo'na anggur iya'a, mian men tombono tano' iya'a nomosuu'mo tutulungina mae' na papalimang ale' iya'a mangala ule' men bokoi obosna.
Kasee papalimang iya'a nangarakopmo tutulungi iya'a. Raaya'a numukul men sa'angu', nampapatei men sambana ka' nangalapak men sambana tia watu.
Noko daa iya'a mian men tombono tano' iya'a nomosuu'mo tutulungina men sambana, kasee labi tia men tumbena, ka' i raaya'apo niwawaukon koikoimo simbaya'na i raaya'a.
Kokomburi'annamo ia nomosuu'mo anakna na ko'ona i raaya'a, taena, ‘Kalu anakku sabole kolayaonna i raaya'a.’
Kasee na tempo papalimang iya'a nimiile' anak iya'a, raaya'a nopootunduniimo taena, ‘Iamo kaya'a a men bo pontombonoi giigii' upana tamana. Mai kita papateia i ia kada' kitamo a pontombonoi budelna.’
Raaya'a nangarakopmo ka' nintibarkon na liwana ale'na anggur iya'a, kasi nampapatei.
Kalu tombono ale'na anggur iya'a taka, upa a bo wawauonna na papalimang iya'a?”
Taena tanaasna imam tia motu-motu'ana lipu' Yahudi, “Ia bo minsilaka'i mian men ba'idek iya'a ka' ale'na anggurna bo tamboikononnamo na papalimang men sambanaan, men daa mongorookon ule'na na ko'ona kalu temponamo.”
Taeni Yesus soosoodo, “Sabole i kuu nambasamo na Alkitaap men koi kani'imari: ‘Watu men ia balo'konmo tukang nosidamo watu tuko men bo pandasi. Men koiya'a ia wawau Tumpu, ka' wawau-Na iya'a nompoposamba' i kita men nimiile'.’
Mbali' iya'a, bantilkonon-Ku na ko'omuu se' Batomundo'anna Alaata'ala bo alaon na ko'omuu ka' bo rookonon na sa'angu' lipu' men daa mingilimang upa men kana' na Batomundo'an iya'a. [
Ime a men mandawo' na watu iya'a bo koraso-raso', ka' ime a men utunonna watu iya'a bo magampial.]”
Na tempo tanaasna imam ka' mian Farisi nongorongor timbaani' ni Yesus, raaya'a ninginti'i se' i raaya'a a men pi'intuon ni Yesus.
Raaya'a nampari-pari mangarakop i Ia, kasee i raaya'a layaonkon mian biai', gause mian biai' iya'a mansarui Ia nabii.
Kasi i Yesus nobatimbaani' soosoodo na ko'ona i raaya'a tae-Na,
“Batomundo'anna Surugaa koi sa'angu' tomundo' men nangawawau ramean posuo'anna anakna.
Ia nomosuu' tutulungina mondolo' mian men nipoko angemo na ramean posuo'an iya'a, kasee i raaya'a bude' taka.
Kasi ia nomosuu' soosoodo tutulungi sambana taena, ‘Bantilkon koi kani'imari na mian men bo dolo'on iya'a inta': Imamat ini'imari! Kakaan nipoko toropotimo, sapi' moro'one tia anakna sapi' men molongo' nipoko koyo'mo. Giigii' nipoko toropotimo. Mai taka na ramean posuo'an iya'a.’
Kasee mian men ni'ange iya'a sian ningimamat. Isian men mae' na ale'na, isian men mae' ningilimang palimangonna,
ka' men sambana nangarakop tutulungina tomundo' iya'a, kasi nampapolosi ka' nampapatei.
Mbaka' nomaso'mo a tomundo' iya'a, kasi nomosuu' surudaduna mbaale'e mampapatei mian men nampapatei tutulungina iya'a ka' muntunu kotana i raaya'a.
Noko daa iya'a, ia norobumo na tutulungina taena, ‘Ramean posuo'an noko toropotmo, kasee mian men ni'ange olukon sianmo kokana'ku bo taka na ramean kani'i.
Mbali' iya'a, rae' na pogolimpanga'anna salan ka' ange a giigii' mian men rumpakionmuu indo'o taka na ramean posuo'an iya'a.’
Kasi nomae' a tutulungi iya'a ka' ningirimpung giigii' mian men rumpakionna i raaya'a na bendar, mian men ba'idek a gau'na ka' mian men pore, pataka nobuke' tia sawe' a tampat ramean posuo'an iya'a.
Na tempo tomundo' iya'a ninsoop bo pootuung tia sawe'na iya'a, ia nimiile' sa'angu' mian men sian nopake pakeanna ramean.
Ia norobumo na ko'ona taena, ‘Oo bela'! Koi upa i koo ninsoop ka'ita see sian namake pakean barame?’ Kasee mian iya'a tongko' nimporokot.
Kasi tomundo' iya'a norobu na tutulungi taena, ‘Koot a saratna tia limana ka' tibarkon a mian iya'a na kapintungan men pika' tuu'. Indo'o i ia bo tumando' ka' marepa tuu'.’ ”
Kasi i Yesus nangkakabusi timbaani'-Na tae-Na, “Biai' a mian men ia ange Tumpu, kasee titiu' a men niruruki.”
Komburi'na nomae'mo a mian Farisi ka' nansangadakon se' koi upa i raaya'a sida monsosooli wurung ni Yesus na upa men pikirawaronna i raaya'a.
Raaya'a nomosuu' muritna i raaya'a tia winawa ni Tomundo' Herodes bapikirawar na Ko'ona taena, “Guru, kai inti'i i Kuu sian muntundun upa men kosian. Mbali' iya'a i Kuu mimisiso'kon pingkira'na Alaata'ala men tuutuu'na. Imepo uga' sian kolayaonmuu, gause i Kuu sian momposasala'kon mian.
Bantilkon na ko'omai: Koi pinginti'i-Muu, daa patalaion a mambayar pajak bona Kaisar kabai sian?”
Kasee i Yesus ninginti'i idekna noana i raaya'a kasi norobu tae-Na, “Wee i kuu mian men minti palo-paloos! Nongko'upa i kuu se' mimitopongi i Yaku'?
Pipiile'kon na Ingku' a doi' bo pambayar pajak iya'a.” Raaya'a nangawawamo na Ko'ona sa'angu' doi' dinar.
Kasi i Yesus nobapikirawar na ko'ona i rayaa tae-Na, “Gambar tia ngaan ni ime ini'i?”
Ia simbati i raaya'a taena, “Gambar tia ngaanna Kaisar.” Taeni Yesus na ko'ona i raaya'a, “Rookon bona Kaisar a upa men tio rookononmuu na Kaisar ka' rookon bona Alaata'ala a upa men tio rookononmuu na Alaata'ala.”
Nongorongor iya'a i raaya'a nosamba'mo, kasi nomae' namarerei i Yesus.
Na iliopo iya'a uga' notakamo ni Yesus a toropii mian Saduki, men koi na pinginti'ina se' mian men lapusmo sianmo tumuo' soosoodo. Raaya'a nobapikirawar na Ko'ona taena,
“Guru! Ai Musa nangaan se' kalu isian sa'angu' moro'one lapus ka' sian anakon, mbaka' utusna moro'one iya'a tio mosuo' tia baluna utusna kada' utusna isian lee'na.
Kasee na ko'omai isian pitu' moro'one moto'utus. Men balaki'na nosuo', kasee komburi'na lapus. Gause i ia sian no'anakon, mbaka' ia posuo'imo utusna.
Utusna men korua'na uga' koiya'a ka' men kotolu'na ka' pataka men kopitu'na.
Komburi'na kabus nolapus i raaya'a giigii', wiwine iya'a uga' nolapusmo.
Na pipitu' moro'one moto'utus iya'a, ime a men bo sida langkai'na wiwine iya'a na ilio pomotuo'ian mian lapus? Gause giigii' i raaya'a nompoboroki'mo i ia.”
Yesus ninsimbati i raaya'a tae-Na, “Kuu nosala'mo, gause i kuu sian minginti'i isiina Alkitaap kabai se' kuasana Alaata'ala!
Na tempo pomotuo'ian mian lapus, raaya'a sian mosuo' ka' sian poposuo'on kasee tumuo' koi malaa'ikat na surugaa.
Kuu mbali' sianpo nambasa men ia bantilkonmo Alaata'ala na ko'omuu se' mian lapus bo potuo'ion? Tae-Na,
‘Yaku'mo a Alaata'ala ni Abraham, Alaata'ala ni Ishak ka' Alaata'ala ni Yakub?’ Ia taasi' Alaata'alana mian lapus kasee Alaata'alana mian tumuo'.”
Mian biai' men nongorongor iya'a samba'kon pisiso'-Na.
Na tempo mian Farisi nongorongor se' i Yesus ninsidakon mian Saduki iya'a somo nimporokot, raaya'a nobarimpungmo.
Ka' sa'angu' mian na ko'ona i raaya'a men wawa ukum Torat nobapikirawar mimitopongi i Yesus. Taena,
“Guru, potoo men koi upa a men tuko na ukum Torat?”
Ia simbati i Yesus tae-Na, “Kolingu'kon a Tumpu Alaata'alamuu tia noa men tuutuu', ka' tia giigii' wakamuu ka' giigii' pinginti'ianmuu.
Koiya'a a potoo men tuko ka' men tumbena.
Potoo korua'na koikoimo potoo men tumbena: Kolingu'kon a simbaya'muu mian koikoimo pongkolingu'konmuu wakamuu.
Giigii' ukum Torat ka' kitap nabii nimpu'u na rua' potoo iya'a.”
Na tempona mian Farisi dauga' potorimpung, ai Yesus nobapikirawar na ko'ona i raaya'a tae-Na,
“Koi upa a pinginti'imuu i Tomundo' Pansalamatkon? Lee' ni ime i Ia?” Taena i raaya'a, “Lee' ni Daud.”
Taeni Yesus, “Kalu koiya'a, koi upa i Daud tia pisiso'na Alus Molinas sida mangaan i Tomundo' Pansalamatkon se' Tumpuna, na tempo ia norobu taena,
Tumpu Alaata'ala nangaanmo na Tumpungku tae-Na: ‘Oruang na paraas uanan-Ku, pataka Yaku' mompoporungku' giigii' mian men mangka'idek i Koo sida malolo' na Ko'oom.’
Mbaka', kalu Daud se' nangaan Tomundo' Pansalamatkon iya'a Tumpuna, koi upa a kosidana se' daa Tomundo' Pansalamatkon uga' bo lee'na?”
Sianta sa'angu'po mian men nomoko ninsimbati i Yesus, ka' muntumbei ilio iya'a sianta sa'angu'po mian men momoko mimikirawar upa-upa na Ko'ona.
Kasi i Yesus norobu na mian biai' ka' na murit-Na tae-Na,
“Wawa ukum Torat ka' mian Farisi nitarai kuasa mompopo'inti'ikon ukum ni Musa.
Mbali' iya'a, lolo' ka' loloikon a giigii' men ia posuu'kon i raaya'a. Kasee alia mingilimang upa men ia limangmo i raaya'a, gause i raaya'a sian mansalankon upa men pisiso'kononna i raaya'a.
Raaya'a momosuu' mingilimang men marawat ka' mompopasa'anikon aturan iya'a na mian, kasee i raaya'a bude' muntulung mian kada' sida mingilimang men koiya'a.
Giigii' men ia limang i raaya'a tongko' kada' bo piile'onna mian. Raaya'a mantalekon mamake lui' sambayang men bambal tia mangarutu'i rendana jubana i raaya'a.
Raaya'a mingkira' umoruang na oruangan men pore na ramean ka' uga' na oruangan men porena na laigan bakitumpuan.
Raaya'a beleskon angga'ionna mian na pasar ka' mingkira' leelo'on Guru.
Kasee i kuu alia mingkira' leelo'on Guru, gause Gurumuu tongko' isian sa'angu' ka' uga' i kuu giigii' moto'utus sa'angu' kaparasaya'an.
Ka' i kuu alia mengeleelo' sa'angu'po mian na tano' balaki' kani'i tama, gause Tamamuu tongko' sa'angu'. Ia Tamamuu men na surugaa.
Ka' alia i kuu mingkira' leelo'on tanaas, gause Tanaasmuu tongko' sa'angu' men ngaanon Tomundo' Pansalamatkon.
Mian men balaki'na na ko'omuu tio sida bo puntulung i kuu.
Mian men mompopodaa wakana bo popokoo'on, ka' mian men mompopokoo' wakana bo popodaaon.
Silaka' i kuu wawa ukum Torat ka' mian Farisi! Kuu mian men minti pa'a-pa'agama! Kuu mongompot mian men minsoop na Batomundo'anna Surugaa, gause i kuu sian minsoop, ka' mian men mampari-pari minsoop na Batomundo'anna Surugaa talantangionmuu. [
Silaka' i kuu wawa ukum Torat ka' mian Farisi! Kuu mian men minti pa'a-pa'agama! Kuu mangakalkon balu wiwine ka' mangarampasi laiganna ka' uga' mingirimboroi gau' ba'idekna tia sambayang biai' taa'. Mbali' iya'a, ukumanmuu a marepana tia ukumanna mian sambana.]
Silaka' i kuu wawa ukum Torat ka' mian Farisi! Kuu mian men minti pa'a-pa'agama! Kuu mae' oloa mengelembeti tobui, ka' mansasayoi longkop tano' tongko' bo pinsidakon sa'angu' mian minsoop agamamuu, kasee i kuu minsidakon i ia mian men bo minsoop naraka, men idekna pinduan paku' koi idekmuu!
Silaka' i kuu tanaas men mampisok! Kuu mimisiso'kon se' kalu mian basumpa' mangaan Laiganna Alaata'ala, mian iya'a sian paraa mongololoikon sumpa'na. Kasee kalu ia basumpa' mangaan mosoni na Laiganna Alaata'ala, ia tio mongololoikon sumpa'na iya'a.
Kuu mian bobo' ka' mampisok! Upa mbali' a men tuko, mosoni men isian na Laiganna Alaata'ala kabai se' Laiganna Alaata'ala men ninsidakon mosoni iya'a molinas?
Kuu mimisiso'kon koi kani'imari: Kalu sa'angu' mian basumpa' mangaan mesba, mian kanono' sian paraa mongololoikon sumpa'na. Kasee kalu ia basumpa' mangaan kurbaan na mesba iya'a, ia tio mongololoikon sumpa'na iya'a.
Kuu se' mampisok tuu'! Upa mbali' a men tuko, kurbaan na mesba kabai se' mesba men minsidakon kurbaan iya'a molinas?
Mbali' iya'a, kalu sa'angu' mian basumpa' mangaan mesba, aratina i ia basumpa' mangaan mesba ka' uga' giigii' kurbaan men isian na mesba iya'a.
Ka' kalu sa'angu' mian basumpa' mangaan Laiganna Alaata'ala, aratina i ia basumpa' mangaan Laiganna Alaata'ala iya'a ka' uga' Alaata'ala men dumodongo na lalomna.
Ka' kalu sa'angu' mian basumpa' mangaan surugaa, aratina i ia basumpa' mangaan oruanganna Alaata'ala, ka' uga' i Ia men no'umoruang na oruangan iya'a.
Silaka' i kuu wawa ukum Torat ka' mian Farisi! Kuu mian men minti pa'a-pa'agama! Ule'na aso-asokmuu koimo solasi, popuuton ka' jintan, kuu rookon a koi sangobosan na lalomna sompulo' obosan bona Alaata'ala. Kasee upa men tuko na ukum Torat sian imamatonmuu, koimo wawau men maloos, polingu'an ka' palolo'an. Poali iya'amo a men tio limangonmuu, ka' alia mamatalai men sambana.
Kuu tanaas men mampisok! Laale na lalomna inumanmuu tapisonmuu, kasee unta kuu pulon!
Silaka' i kuu wawa ukum Torat ka' mian Farisi! Kuu mian men minti pa'a-pa'agama! Kuu koi sasangkir tia lean men ni'oso'i moloe' na liwana, kasee na lalomna mariingi' tuu'. Gause upa men kuu poko'ule' iya'a, kuu dapot na podoko'anmuu.
Kuu mampisok! Oso'i kutung bi poloe' a lalomna sasangkir tia leanmuu kada' na liwana uga' sida moloe'.
Silaka' i kuu wawa ukum Torat ka' mian Farisi! Kuu mian men minti pa'a-pa'agama! Kuu koi baleanan men niceet bubulak. Na liwana piile'on pore, kasee na lalomna buke' tia wuku ka' giigii' men bobosi'.
Koiya'a uga' i kuu. Na pimiile'na mian koi se' pore, kasee noamuu borek sowu-sowu ka' ba'idek tuu'.
Silaka' i kuu wawa ukum Torat ka' mian Farisi! Kuu mian men minti pa'a-pa'agama! Kuu mangawawau baleanan men pore bona nabii, ka' mompore-porei patungna mian men malolo' na Tumpu.
Ka' i kuu norobu taemuu, ‘Kalu se' i kai tumuo' na tempo pulimai mbaripian, kai sian tololo' tii raaya'a na pampapateian nabii.’
Gause noamuu mompopodaa wakamuu men koiya'a, mbaka' i kuu mimpipiile'kon se' gau'muu koikoimo pulimuu, ka' i kuu tuutuu' lee'na mian men nampapatei nabii.
Mbali' iya'a, imputi ka' upusi a gau'na pulimuu men ia poko tumbeimo i raaya'a!
Wee i kuu men koi ule, ka' koi lee'na ule ba'idek! Koi upa i kuu mbali' daa sida mansalamatkon wakamuu na ukuman na naraka?
Imamat ini'imari! Yaku' bo momosuu' na ko'omuu nabii, mian pinginti'ianan, ka' wawa ukum Torat. Kasee sambana bo papateionmuu, ka' sambana bo saliipkononmuu. Isian men bo sasalionmuu na laigan bakitumpuanmuu, ka' laya'onmuu na sa'angu' kota mae' na kota sambana.
Mbaka' i kuu bo ukumon gause wawaumuu iya'a, ka' wawauna pulimuu men nampapatei giigii' mian men sian sala'an na tempopo nampapateian i Habel men sian sala'an pataka nampapateian i Zakharia, anak ni Berekhya, men kuu papatei na ola'na Laiganna Alaata'ala tia mesba.
Imamat a men taeng-Ku', ka' uga' bantilkonon-Ku na ko'omuu se' mian men tumuo' na tempo koini'i bo ukumon gause giigii' iya'a.
Yerusalem! Yerusalem! Nabii kuu papatei. Mian men ia posuu' Alaata'ala kuu lapak tia watu pataka lapus! Piribiai'mo i Yaku' mingkira' mongoroot giigii' mian men dumodongo na ko'omuu koi sinana siok mongopo'i anakna na intuna laina, kasee i kuu bude'!
Imamat ini'imari! Laiganmuu kani'i bo parereion ka' sianmo mianna.
Bantilkonon-Ku na ko'omuu se' supu koini'i i kuu sianmo mimiile' i Yaku' soosoodo pataka i kuu morobu taemuu, ‘Barakaation i Ia men taka pokauonna Tumpu.’ ”
Na tempo i Yesus namarerei Laiganna Alaata'ala, murit-Na notakamo na Ko'ona ka' ninsiso' Laiganna Alaata'ala.
Yesus norobu na ko'ona i raaya'a, tae-Na, “Too daa i kuu nimiile' giigii' iya'a? Imamat iya'a. Bantilkonon-Ku na ko'omuu se' ni'imarian sianta sa'angu'po watu na Laiganna Alaata'ala kani'i a men dauga' patalaion pootapi'. Wiwi'na bo runtunion!”
Komburi'na i Yesus nomae'mo na Buu'na Zaitun ka' na tempo i Ia oru-oruang, murit-Na notakamo bo pootundunii tii Ia men tongko' raaraaya'ana. Taena i raaya'a, “Bantilkon i kai se' ipi a bo sidaanna men tae-Muu umba'a, ka' oosan upa men bo pinginti'ian kotakaan-Muu ka' kakabusanna tempo?”
Ia simbati Yesus tae-Na, “Maka'amat dako' i kuu ko'akalian.
Gause biai' a mian bo taka ka' mangaan ngaan-Ku ka' morobu taena, ‘Yaku'mo a Tomundo' Pansalamatkon!’ Raaya'a bo mangakalkon mian biai'.
Kuu bo momorongor lelena mian poopapate ka' laungna sindapanna mian men poopapate, kasee alia uga' layaon. Gause upa-upa iya'a tio bo sida, kasee iya'a taasi'po kakabusanna tempo.
Lipu' men sa'angu' bo poopapate mintimbangi lipu' men sambana, ka' batomundo'an sa'angu' bo poopapate mintimbangi batomundo'an men sambana. Na toropii dodongoan takaionna loluan tia lili'.
Giigii' iya'a baasi tumbena, koi polos men baasi ia suri sa'angu' wiwine na tempo mindompu'.
Tempo iya'a i kuu bo rakopon ka' rookonon bo repaion kasi papateion. Kuu bo kokundaionna giigii' lipu' gause na pongololo'an i Yaku'.
Na tempo iya'a biai' a mian bude'mo sida murit-Ku. Raaya'a pookalaakkon tia simbaya'na men pooka'idek.
Bo taka a biai' minti nabi-nabii men tongko' momboreki mian biai'.
Idek bo kanturangan men dodoa tuu' pataka mian biai' sianmo pookolingu'kon.
Kasee mian men mantaan pataka kokomburi'anna bo salamatkonon.
Ka' Lele Pore men mambantilkon Batomundo'anna Alaata'ala bo lelekonon na longkop tano' balaki' kada' giigii' mian momorongor. Moko daa iya'a kasi taka a kakabusanna tempo.
Sa'angu' tempo i kuu bo mimiile' pinsilaka'i men ba'idek kumekerer na tampat men molinas, koi wurungna Tumpu men ia tadulkon i Nabii Daniel. (Sulano i kuu men mambasa iya'a sida minginti'i.)
Na tempo iya'a, mian men isian na libutan Yudea tio mamarere na buu'na.
Mian men monda'a na wawona laiganna amo' malau ka' minsoop na laigan mangala upana.
Mian men na ale' sobii ka' mule'kon mangala pakeanna.
Marepa a wiwine men mampaiwawa tempo iya'a, ka' sina men dauga' momosusui anak.
Pa'ase' na sambayangmuu kada' alia paraa mamarere na tempo memel kabai na ilio Sabat.
Gause na tempo iya'a bo taka a sa'angu' repaan men marepa tuu' koi men sianpo ia toosuri mian nuntumbeipo nosidaanna tano' balaki' pataka koini'i. Ka' sianmo isian repaan men koiya'a soosoodo.
Kalu Alaata'ala sian monsondo'i tempo marepa iya'a, mbaka' sianta sa'angu'po mian men salamat. Kasee kada' mian men Ia ruruki sida salamat, mbaka' bo sondo'ion-Na tempo iya'a.
Na tempo iya'a kalu isian mian morobu na ko'omuu taena, ‘Piile', kani'imo a Tomundo' Pansalamatkon!’ kabai taena, ‘Piile', kale'emo a Tomundo' Pansalamatkon!’ alia mamarasaya upa men ia ngaan mian kanono'.
Gause pansalamatkon borek tia minti nabi-nabii bo taka. Raaya'a bo mingilimang oos men pore tuu' ka' upa kosamba' bo pangakalianna mian, maupo mian men ia rurukimo Alaata'ala bo mian-Na. Uga' pi'akalionna i raaya'a kalu too pokoonna.
Daa Yaku' bantilkonmo a upa men bo rumpakion ini'imari.
Kalu i kuu momorongor mian morobu na ko'omuu taena, ‘Piile'! Ia isian na tano' maleas,’ alia i kuu waale'e. Kabai kalu taena, ‘Piile'! Ia ninsapit na lalomna tambin kani'i,’ alia mamarasaya.
Gause kotakaanna Anak Manusia bo sida koi kilap men tarang dumilep ringkat na bete'an taka na sopokan.
Aana a men isian bangke, ino'o moriwut a sapu' men mangkaan bangke.
Sarataa moko daa repaan na tempo iya'a, matana ilio bo pintung, ka' wulan sianmo tarang. Bitu'on bo mandawo' ra'amari na langit, ka' pungkuasai langit iya'a bo toyunggot.
Tempo iya'a oosanna Anak Manusia bo kampiile'an na langit. Giigii' lipu' na tano' balaki' bo wiri. Raaya'a bo mimiile' Anak Manusia taka ra'amari na wawona antong tia kuasa ka' lingkaangan tuu'.
Torompeet balaki' bo duupon, ka' Anak Manusia bo momosuu' malaa'ikat-Na mingirimpung mian men Ia ruruki bo mian-Na na longkop tano' balaki' ka' na puusna langit men sa'angu' pataka puusna men sambana.
Inau' a timbaani'na kau ara. Kalu panga'na malalas ka' molusa', ka' nosumumpemo, inti'ionmuu se' tempona pengkar booboomo.
Koiya'a uga' kalu i kuu mimiile' men taeng-Ku' kaekae'mo sida. Inti'ionmuu se' tempona booboomo.
Imamat a men taeng-Ku', ka' uga' bantilkonon-Ku na ko'omuu se' giigii' upa men Yaku' poko bantilkonmo na ko'omuu iya'a bo sida koo'po tia mian men tumuo' tempo koini'i lapus giigii'na.
Langit ka' tano' balaki' bo penta', kasee wurung-Ku isian pataka sidutu.
Kasee sianta sa'angu'po mian men minginti'i iliona tia jaamna. Malaa'ikat na surugaa sian, Anakna Alaata'ala uga' sian. Tongko' Tama na surugaa a men daa ninginti'i.
Gause koi upa a men nosida na tempo ni Nuh mbaripian, mbaka' koiya'a uga' a men bo sida na tempo kotakaanna Anak Manusia.
Na tempo koo'po tia tano' balaki' ia limbusi weer, mian kumaan, ba'inum, mosuo' ka' mompoposuo' anakna. Koiya'a pataka na ilio ninsoopan ni Nuh na lalomna kapal.
Na tempo tano' balaki' ia limbusi weer iya'a ka' ninsilaka'i i raaya'a giigii', ya'asi ka' ia inti'i i raaya'a a upa men kaekae' sida. Koiya'a uga' a men bo sida na tempo kotakaanna Anak Manusia.
Na tempo iya'a, rua' mian pintanga' balimang na ale'. Sa'angu' mian bo wawaon, ka' men sa'angu' bo parereion.
Rua' wiwine pintanga' minggiling gandum. Sa'angu' bo wawaon, ka' men sa'angu' bo parereion.
Mbaka' mandagaisi, gause ilio kotakaanna Tumpumuu sian inti'ionmuu.
Imamat a timbaani' kani'imari! Kalu tombono laigan inti-inti'i se' jaam pipii a takaanna mian mamangan na tempo malom, ia sabole sian royot kada' mian mamangan sian minsoop na laiganna.
Mbali' iya'a, kuu uga' tio maka'amat. Gause Anak Manusia bo taka na tempo men sian sasaakionmuu.”
“Kalu isian tutulungi men malolo' ka' motu'a a noana, iamo a men nakatonna tanaasna bo pantanaasi tutulungi sambana ka' mantarai i raaya'a kumaan na tempona.
Barakaatan a tutulungi iya'a kalu tanaasna mule'kon ka' mantakai i ia pintanga' mingilimang palimangonna.
Imamat a men taeng-Ku', ka' uga' bantilkonon-Ku na ko'omuu se' tanaas iya'a bo mamarasayakon giigii' kupangna na tutulungi iya'a.
Kasee kalu tutulungi iya'a ba'idek, ia bo morobu na noana taena,
‘Tanaasku dauga' manau' ka' mule'kon.’ Mbaka' ia nampapolosimo tutulungi men sambana, ka' kumaan ba'inum tia mian men bukuan lio'.
Kasee kokomburi'anna tanaasna bo mule'kon na ilio men sian sasaakionna tutulungi iya'a, ka' jaam men sian inti'ion.
Mbaka' tutulungi iya'a bo papolosionna tanaasna, ka' tibarkonon na tampatna mian men minti pore-pore! Indo'o i raaya'a bo tumando' ka' marepa tuu'.”
“Na tempo kotakaanna Anak Manusia soosoodo, Batomundo'anna Surugaa koi timbaani' kani'imari. Isian sompulo' wiwine laandue' nompoo'ala panso, kasi mae' mangalaboti suo' moro'one.
Lilima' bobo', ka' lilima' pande.
Lilima' men bobo' nangawawa panso kasee sian nangawawa likison bo punturangina.
Lilima' men pande nangawawa panso tia uga' likison bo punturangina.
Suo' moro'one iya'a naalin ka' notaka, mbaka' wiwine iya'a nuntumbeimo nototundo' ka' noroyot.
Tanga'na rondom, kasi nirongor a mian mengeleelo'kon taena, ‘Takamo a suo' moro'one! Mai laboti i ia.’
Sompulo' wiwine iya'a nowangonmo ka' nontotobo'i pansona i raaya'a.
Wiwine men bobo' iya'a norobu na wiwine men pande taena, ‘Taraion likisonmuu titiu' i kai, gause pansomai boomo pate.’
Ia simbati wiwine men pande iya'a taena, ‘Sian sida! Dako' i kita giigii' kokabusionna likison. Rae' pingili na toko'.’
Mbaka' wiwine men bobo' iya'a nomae'mo mingili likison. Sarataa noporus nomae' i raaya'a, suo' moro'one iya'a notakamo. Lilima' wiwine men nobatoropotmo iya'a ninsoopmo singka-singkat tia suo' moro'one na tampat ramean, ka' soopan ni'omporimo.
Komburi'na wiwine men sambana iya'a notakamo. Raaya'a nengeleelo'mo taena, ‘Tuan! Tuan! Kai miki leakikon soopan kada' i kai minsoop.’
Kasee suo' moro'one iya'a ninsimbati taena, ‘Bantilkononku na ko'omuu se' yaku' sian poo'inti'i tii kuu.’ ”
Kasi i Yesus nongkokomburi'i timbaani'-Na iya'a tae-Na, “Mbali' iya'a, maka'amat gause iliona kabai se' jaamna sian inti'ionmuu.”
“Na tempo kotakaanna Anak Manusia soosoodo, Batomundo'anna Surugaa koi timbaani' kani'imari. Isian sa'angu' tanaas mae' na dodongoan men oloa. Ia nengeleelo'mo tutulungina ka' namarasayakon kupangna na ko'ona i raaya'a.
Na sanda' tutulungi iya'a ia tarai koi men pokoonna sanda-sanda'. Na sa'angu' tutulungi ia tarai lima' loloon doi' mosoni. Ka' na sa'angu' tutulungi soosoodo ia tarai rua' loloon doi' mosoni. Ka' na sa'angu' tutulungi men sambana ia tarai sololoon doi' mosoni. Kasi ia nomae'.
Tutulungi men nangalabot lima' loloon doi' mosoni iya'a lako-lako nomae' badagang, kasi nantausi soosoodo ule' lima' loloon doi' mosoni.
Koiya'a uga' a tutulungi men nangalabot rua' loloon doi' mosoni iya'a nantausi soosoodo ule' rua' loloon doi' mosoni.
Kasee tutulungi men nangalabot sololoon doi' mosoni iya'a nomae'mo nengkeke tano' kasi nanganaa' indo'o doi'na tanaasna.
Nanau' a noporusanna iya'a, tanaasna tutulungi iya'a nomule'kon ka' nopoosaa'i tii raaya'a.
Tutulungi men nangalabot lima' loloon doi' mosoni iya'a taka ka' nongorookon sompulo' loloon. Taena, ‘Tanaas, kuu nongorookon lima' loloon doi' mosoni na ingku'. Piile'! Yaku' nomoko nantausi ule' lima' loloon soosoodo.’
Taena tanaas iya'a, ‘Pore tuu' a men koo wawau. Koo tutulungi men pore ka' malolo'. Gause i koo daa sida ooskonon mau tongko' na upa titiu', mbaka' biai' a men pokaukononku na ko'oom. Mai, pinsoop ka' munsuri beles tii yaku'.’
Kasi tutulungi men nangalabot rua' loloon doi' mosoni iya'a notaka ka' norobu taena, ‘Tanaas, kuu nongorookon rua' loloon doi' mosoni na ingku'. Piile'! Yaku' nomoko nantausi ule' rua' loloon soosoodo.’
Taena tanaas iya'a, ‘Pore tuu' a men koo wawau. Koo daa tutulungi men pore ka' malolo'. Gause i koo daa sida ooskonon mau tongko' na upa titiu', mbaka' biai' a men pokaukononku na ko'oom. Mai, pinsoop ka' munsuri beles tii yaku'.’
Kokomburi'anna tutulungi men nangalabot sololoon doi' mosoni iya'a notakamo ka' norobu taena, ‘Tanaas, yaku' inti'i i kuu sa'angu' mian men maso'on. Kuu mamadak na ale' men sian kuu kamburi, ka' mangala ule' na ale' men sian kuu asoki.
Gause i yaku' layaonkon i kuu, doi'muu yaku' naa'mo na tano'. Mbaka' kani'imo a doi'muu.’
Taena tanaas, ‘Koomo a tutulungi men ba'idek ka' molulu'! Kalu i koo inti'imo se' yaku' mamadak na ale' men sian yaku' kamburi, ka' mangala ule' na ale' men sian yaku' asoki,
nongko'upa mbali' i koo sian manganaa' doi'ku iya'a na baang kada' na tempo i yaku' mule'kon, yaku' daa mangalabot soosoodo doi'ku iya'a tia bungana?’
‘Mbali' iya'a, alamo a doi' men isian na ko'ona kaya'a ka' rookon na mian men nitarai sompulo' loloon doi' mosoni iya'a.
Gause sanda' mian men isianmo upa ia tombonoi bo taraion soosoodo, ka' i ia bo kalabian. Kasee mian men sian montombonoi upa-upa, toro tiu'po upa men daa isian na ko'ona bo alaon.
Ka' tutulungi men sian kana'na iya'a alaka' tibarkon na kapintungan men pika' tuu'. Indo'o ia bo tumando' ka' marepa tuu'.’
Kalu Anak Manusia taka bookoi Tomundo' lolo'onna giigii' malaa'ikat-Na, Ia bo umoruang na oruangan kobalaki'an-Na.
Giigii' lipu' na dunia bo rimpungon na arop-Na. Kasi i Ia bo mengerensakon giigii' mian sida rua' tompuk koi pontondong ayop mengerensakon domba ka' bembe'.
Mian men mingilimang pingkira'na Alaata'ala rimpungon na paraas uanan-Na, ka' men sian mingilimang pingkira'na Alaata'ala rimpungon na paraas kauri'-Na.
Kasi Tomundo' iya'a morobu na mian men paraas uanan-Na taena, ‘Mai i kuu men barakaationna Tamang-Ku. Pinsoop na batomundo'an men nitoropotimo bo ko'omuu na tempopo ninsidakonan dunia.
Gause na tempo i Yaku' mololu, kuu nantarai i Yaku' kakaan, ka' na tempo i Yaku' moro'u, kuu nantarai i Yaku' weer. Tempo i Yaku' koi mian tumaka, kuu nangalabot i Yaku' na laiganmuu.
Tempo i Yaku' sian pakeanan, kuu nantarai i Yaku' pakean. Tempo i Yaku' nanggeo, kuu nandagai i Yaku'. Tempo i Yaku' nitarungku, kuu nengelego'i Yaku'.’
Kasi mian men pore a wawauna iya'a norobu taena, ‘Tumpu, maripi mbali' a nimiile'anmai i Kuu mololu, kasi i kai nantarai i Kuu kakaan, kabai moro'u, kasi i kai nantarai i Kuu weer?
Maripi mbali' a nimiile'anmai i Kuu koi mian tumaka, kasi i kai nangalaboti i Kuu na laiganmai? Maripi mbali' i Kuu sian pakeanan, kasi i kai nantarai i Kuu pakean?
Maripi mbali' a nimiile'anmai i Kuu nanggeo kabai na tarungkuan, kasi i kai nengelego'i Kuu?’
Tomundo' iya'a bo minsimbati taena, ‘Tuutuu' mba'a. Kasee bantilkonon-Ku na ko'omuu se' na tempo i kuu ningilimang iya'a, maupo na sa'angu' utus-Ku men talalaisna, mbaka' i kuu ningilimangmo bo Ingku'.’
Kasi Tomundo' iya'a morobu na mian men paraas kauri'-Na taena, ‘Rae', uar i kuu, mian men silaka'mo! Pinsoop na apu men sian morok men nipoko toropotimo bona Ibiliis ka' malaa'ikatna!
Gause na tempo i Yaku' mololu, kuu sian nantarai Yaku' kakaan. Tempo i Yaku' moro'u, kuu sian nantarai Yaku' weer.
Tempo i Yaku' koi mian tumaka, kuu sian nangalabot i Yaku' na laiganmuu. Tempo i Yaku' sian pakeanan, kuu sian nantarai i Yaku' pakean. Tempo i Yaku' nanggeo ka' nitarungku, kuu sian nangkalesang i Yaku'.’
